Short Summary

Deteriorate is a novel set in a post-climate change world. It follows three friends, Theo, Nick, and Jordan, over the course of a backpacking trip and their experiences in the harsh world that they find themselves in.

My name is Malcolm Brune, and I am the author of Deteriorate. I wrote this book because I am unsettled with the way the world has treated our climate, and I want all of us to step up.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover a little bit about what the Earth could look like in 30 years. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to face the reality of what our daily lives could look like and learn the importance of our relationships with others in a less-than-comfortable world.

BLURB:
In 2050, the oceans have risen. Coastal cities are all but empty. The globe is warm, very warm. The meat and agricultural industries have collapsed. Theo, Nick, and Jordan set off on a journey they had embarked on once before, many years prior. With each step, they must face the harsh environment that the world has evolved into.

You will love this book if you enjoy spending time outdoors, have a passion for the environment, or like to think about the future.

Deteriorate speaks to teens and adults who want to face climate change and friendships in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that Deteriorate inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

What can I do for the Earth?

How can I keep my relationships safe heading into the future?

How much longer can we deny climate change?

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing climate change and our role in caring for our home, as well as relationships, will change us all for the better.

 

About the Author

Malcolm Brune is a student at Northeastern University, studying Bioengineering with a concentration in Medical Devices. He is a problem solver and wants to make a difference in the world. Malcolm wrote this book because he is passionate about the world he lives in. He worries about its future but hopes that environmentally, we can get on the right track. Malcolm loves to read, travel, and spend time outdoors. His love for adventure and learning extends to hobbies as well, and he can be found exploring new activities every few months.

For more information, you can connect with Malcolm Brune at malcolmbrune@gmail.com and at Malcolm Brune on LinkedIn and Facebook and @malcolm_brune on Instagram.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

story:
Les Éditions de la Tournure - Coop de solidarité, c'est quoi ?

Fondée le 20 décembre 2012, la Tournure est une maison d’édition à teneur poétique. Anomalie dans le milieu littéraire, elle se présente comme une alternative aux modes d’édition traditionnels :

  • La Tournure est une coopérative de solidarité sans but lucratif regroupant quelque 200 membres. Son fonctionnement de base est assuré par une dizaine de membres actifs sur un mode horizontal, jaseux et dissensuel.
  • Côté financier, aucune subvention gouvernementale n’est encore entrée dans son compte en banque à ce jour.
  • Elle distribue elle-même ses livres dans des librairies indépendantes de Montréal, Québec, Sherbrooke et Rimouski. Elle ne se retrouvera jamais au Renaud-Bray.
  • La Tournure est le fruit du travail de 10 bénévoles d'horizons différents.

Elle se distingue aussi par ses activités réparties en trois champs d'action:

L’édition de livres à teneur poétique et de zines

  • Le processus de sélection des manuscrits est réalisé par la dizaine de membres actifs de la Tournure.
  • Le travail des manuscrits s’accomplit sur la base d’un accompagnement littéraire méticuleux, lent et pluriel (plusieurs personnes effectuent de l’accompagnement et au moins un comité de lecture est organisé pour chaque livre).
  • L’auteur-e participe à toutes les étapes de production de son livre. C’est la raison pour laquelle tous les objet-livres de la Tournure ont une identité unique.
  • L’auteur-e reçoit 21% du prix du livre vendu en librairie et jusqu’à 31% hors librairie, alors que la norme dans le milieu du livre est de 10% de droits d’auteur.

  • Ses livres sont autant d’effusions pour mieux céder à la poésie: celle des mots, des images et des corps. Ces livres tentent l’étreinte. Car on lui a dit que l’étreinte poétique, comme l’étreinte de chair, tant qu’elle dure, défend toute échappée sur la misère du monde (André Breton). 

Les projets communautaires

  • La Tournure ne peut s’imaginer produire des livres sans penser à ceux et celles qui pour une raison ou une autre n’y ont pas accès. Elle organise à chaque année un projet visant à transmettre son engouement pour la poésie et les petites connaissances qu’elle a récoltées au cours de sa courte existence (ateliers de création littéraire, d’initiation à la poésie et à l’édition, etc.).

Les événements poétiques

  • Voulant se distinguer de ce qui se fait traditionnellement, la Tournure organise des événements qui repensent les rapports entre spectateur-trices et poésie et entre différentes disciplines artistiques. Elle a notamment mélangé la poésie au théâtre, à la musique électronique et à la performance.

Où ira l’argent amassé?

L’argent permettra de :

Publier les 4 projets de livres en cours et organiser les lancements:

  • Ventres de Rachel Bergeron
  • Strip-tease de cayenne de Marik Audet
  • Le désordre éclatant du silence de Pascale Desrosiers
  • Les garçons au vent de Roxane Nadeau

Réaliser deux événements poétiques:

  • Reparlez-moi de votre brève maison IV
  • Création d'une adaptation scénique de l’œuvre de Violette Leduc

Accomplir un projet communautaire

story_txt:
Les Éditions de la Tournure - Coop de solidarité, c'est quoi ?Fondée le 20 décembre 2012, la Tournure est une maison d’édition à teneur poétique. Anomalie dans le milieu littéraire, elle se présente comme une alternative aux modes d’édition traditionnels :
La Tournure est une coopérative de solidarité sans but lucratif regroupant quelque 200 membres. Son fonctionnement de base est assuré par une dizaine de membres actifs sur un mode horizontal, jaseux et dissensuel.
Côté financier, aucune subvention gouvernementale n’est encore entrée dans son compte en banque à ce jour.
Elle distribue elle-même ses livres dans des librairies indépendantes de Montréal, Québec, Sherbrooke et Rimouski. Elle ne se retrouvera jamais au Renaud-Bray.
La Tournure est le fruit du travail de 10 bénévoles d'horizons différents.
Elle se distingue aussi par ses activités réparties en trois champs d'action:L’édition de livres à teneur poétique et de zines
Le processus de sélection des manuscrits est réalisé par la dizaine de membres actifs de la Tournure.
Le travail des manuscrits s’accomplit sur la base d’un accompagnement littéraire méticuleux, lent et pluriel (plusieurs personnes effectuent de l’accompagnement et au moins un comité de lecture est organisé pour chaque livre).
L’auteur-e participe à toutes les étapes de production de son livre. C’est la raison pour laquelle tous les objet-livres de la Tournure ont une identité unique.
L’auteur-e reçoit 21% du prix du livre vendu en librairie et jusqu’à 31% hors librairie, alors que la norme dans le milieu du livre est de 10% de droits d’auteur.
Ses livres sont autant d’effusions pour mieux céder à la poésie: celle des mots, des images et des corps. Ces livres tentent l’étreinte. Car on lui a dit que l’étreinte poétique, comme l’étreinte de chair, tant qu’elle dure, défend toute échappée sur la misère du monde (André Breton). 
Les projets communautairesLa Tournure ne peut s’imaginer produire des livres sans penser à ceux et celles qui pour une raison ou une autre n’y ont pas accès. Elle organise à chaque année un projet visant à transmettre son engouement pour la poésie et les petites connaissances qu’elle a récoltées au cours de sa courte existence (ateliers de création littéraire, d’initiation à la poésie et à l’édition, etc.).Les événements poétiquesVoulant se distinguer de ce qui se fait traditionnellement, la Tournure organise des événements qui repensent les rapports entre spectateur-trices et poésie et entre différentes disciplines artistiques. Elle a notamment mélangé la poésie au théâtre, à la musique électronique et à la performance.Où ira l’argent amassé?L’argent permettra de :Publier les 4 projets de livres en cours et organiser les lancements:

Ventres de Rachel Bergeron

Strip-tease de cayenne de Marik Audet

Le désordre éclatant du silence de Pascale Desrosiers

Les garçons au vent de Roxane Nadeau
Réaliser deux événements poétiques:
Reparlez-moi de votre brève maison IV
Création d'une adaptation scénique de l’œuvre de Violette Leduc
Accomplir un projet communautaireAccompagnement littéraire avec des personnes en situation d'itinérance qui seront publiées dans le journal L'Itinéraire à l'automne 2017 et à l'hiver 2018.

story:
Update! 

It is with gratitude, excitement, and a feeling of accomplishment that I’m happy to announce that my campaign goal has now been fully funded due to additional outside funding! I would like to thank my fabulous friends, family, mentors, & publisher for coming together to support me on this endeavor. We couldn’t have done this without you!

Story of My Book

Pretty Young details the various kinds of mental noise & distractions that young women face as they grow up and enter adulthood, and specifically entrepreneurship.

My name is Sarah Whitney Humphrey, and I am the author of Pretty Young. I wrote this book because, as a 23-year-old woman, I personally understand the mental and emotional struggles that all young women face as we grow up in a culture and society that can oftentimes produce a lack of confidence, worthiness, and assuredness in ourselves. I want to bring these issues to light and change the narrative!

I hope that by reading my book, you will begin to recognize and understand your own limitations and mental noise present within your own self. These limitations and mental noise & distractions often unconsciously affect every aspect of our life, so I aim to highlight various issues that young women often face, yet so often neglect to address. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for mental wellbeing, gender equality, and entrepreneurship. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you discover your own limitations and mental distractions so you can begin to show up in this world like you were designed to — confident, worthy, and assured!

In Pretty Young, you'll learn about the cultural, societal, and religious pressures placed on women from a young age, mental health and illness, the sexualization of women, the gender disparity gap in entrepreneurship, and other similar topics that women often neglect to talk about. 

You'll hear stories such as...

  • Social media’s mental and emotional affect on young women’s wellbeing and how the media has contributed to an increase in body-image related issues
  • How to recognize signs of a toxic relationship along with practical tips and scientific-based research on how to overcome these toxic patterns
  • Understanding your need for validation and learning to self-validate through a series of psychological-based practices
  • Uncovering the underbelly of the #MeToo movement, gender-based violence against women, and my personal experiences 
  • How women can begin to close the gender gap in entrepreneurship & business so they can be the CEO their parents always wanted them to marry!

You will love this book if you are a college-aged or post-graduate woman looking to better herself, you want to learn more about women’s right issues, or you want to support me! :)

Pretty Young is a nonfiction book that speaks to young women interested in mental and emotional wellbeing and anyone who is looking to help amplify more women’s stories who want to look at mental wellbeing and women’s life experiences in a new way.

Pretty Young

The book is written in 3 parts:

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapter 1. This section explains the overall premise of the book, as well as how women are treated and viewed in society today.

Part 2 contains chapters 2 through 14. This section details various experiences that women go through on a daily basis, including stories regarding mental wellbeing, social media & its affects on women, familial and cultural pressures, gender-based violence against women, confidence, misogyny, and more! Every chapter in this section includes personal stories, as well as several different accounts from friends, colleagues, social media influencers, professors, and entrepreneurs.

Part 3 contains chapters 15 through 17. This final section details how all of these prior experiences affect women as they enter entrepreneurship and business. From the pay gap to sexism in the workplace, I detail the stories of female entrepreneurs, such as Sara Blakely, Allee Williams, Sydney Williams, and more.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

About the Author

Sarah Whitney is a 23-year-old woman who is passionate about all things mental, emotional, physical, & spiritual wellbeing related. Sarah is your typical fun-loving, active, and extroverted young woman; but it’s her drive, discipline, & desire to make a difference that set her apart from the rest! It’s her greatest aspiration to live a life that matters and hopes to promote the importance of engaging, vulnerable conversations. While they are sometimes not the easiest to have, they are essential for overall personal development! 

Having graduated from the University of San Diego in the midst of a pandemic, Sarah, like many of her peers, was at a loss when it came to figuring out her life path. Yet, as someone who dreams big, Sarah decided that there was never a better time than to follow her dream of writing a book!

Sarah wrote Pretty Young because she wanted to highlight the very real and sometimes very hard experiences women face on a daily basis. Whether these issues are mental, emotional, physical, spiritual, or a varied combination of the four, Sarah knew that she was not alone in experiencing hardships and hopes to show young women that they are never alone.

In her free time, you can find Sarah taking lots of long walks on the beach, enjoying some form of exercise, or hanging out with friends. Once the pandemic is over and it’s safe to travel abroad, Sarah is excited to hit the town, and Barcelona will be her first stop!

For more information, you can connect with Sarah at itaintitsispodcast@gmail.com and at @sarahwhitneyhumphrey or @itaintitsispodcast.

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #PrettyYoung and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

All my love,
Sarah Whitney Humphrey

story:
There’s Only ‘I’ in Team is a multidimensional exploration of business dilemmas and the interactivity between our individual genius (our 'I') and that of others.

A healthy interactivity with others is necessary for our best problem solving, and is the only true path to innovation. We need each other, but we also get in each other's ways; this book provides a way forward to deal with - and even benefit from - this paradox.

This book is research-backed, insightful, candid, and funny. By the end, you’ll have a completely different way of thinking about professional relationships; you may even come away with greater insight on the ‘secret sauce’ of meaningful personal relationships too!

Why I Needed to Write This Book

My approach is different from other approaches because it respects and celebrates who we are as individuals – our individual genius – and gives us a roadmap for empowering this genius that will elevate others and is the key to innovation.

My name is Dr. Annemarie Spadafore and I am the author of There’s Only 'I' in Team. I wrote this book because, while there are hundreds of thousands of leadership books, none of them quite capture the full picture of what is actually going on in my client’s business relationships. Other books are two dimensional, whereas my book provides a multidimensional way of thinking about the common yet intractable business dilemmas they face.

I’m always looking to develop myself, and this constant quest for insight has led to me discovering an incredibly valuable approach that has been proven to strengthen relationships and lead to better results in dealing with dilemmas. But to my surprise, not much has been written about this approach outside of academic journals.

My clients deserve better. There is a real gap in the literature on how to truly be effective in business relationships, and I had to do something about it. I decided to write this book to bridge this gap and provide clients - and you! - with this truly valuable information.

 

Why You Need to Read This Book

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that there is so much more potential in yourself and your work relationships than what you've previously explored. There are many more opportunities for us to solve problems, be innovative, and to get things done than we might be aware of, if only we had the necessary perspective!

In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for thinking differently about our dilemmas, so that we can be our best and help others be their best as well. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you:

  • Use your ‘individual genius’ in the most effective way
  • Avoid becoming entangled in exhausting and distracting conflicts
  • Utilize a different way of thinking about leadership dilemmas and challenges
  • Expertly lead yourself and others through change
  • Wield your power most effectively to solve problems and drive innovation

In this book, you'll learn about relationship systems and how they impact our performance and our results. You’ll learn about how we can make the most of these systems to bring out the  genius in all of us, while driving creative and innovative responses to large-scale challenges and obstacles.

You'll hear stories such as...

  • A story straight from the U.S. military on what it really takes to build trust with others
  • Examples of executives who are courageous enough to lead differently and who are getting incredible results
  • Stories that further illuminate groundbreaking research on the brain and our responses to others

 

You will love this book if you are prepared for the amazing empowerment that comes from really inhabiting your strengths and owning who you are. You’ll also love it if you might be a little disenchanted with the insincerity of other approaches in influencing, motivating, and collaborating with others, and if you are hungry to learn what actually works!

  • If you are sometimes puzzled by the behavior of people in business environments, or any professional environment or workplace, this book is for you
  • If you sometimes feel that other people don’t really understand or appreciate your strengths, this book is for you
  • If you are less-than-stoked by some of the behavior of your family members or friends, this book is for you
  • If you just like learning new things, including having ‘aha’ moments, particularly in regard to the fascinating study of human behavior, this book is for you
  • If you are just generally annoyed by others at times, this book is (especially) for you!

 

There’s Only ‘I’ in Team is a nonfiction book that speaks both to business executives and any person who is courageous enough to upgrade their thinking about relationships, and who wants to look at collaboration and fully utilizing their talents, strengths, and gifts in a new way.

There’s never been a better time for this book. We have all faced a massive amount of upheaval and change, and this is an amazing opportunity to rethink how we operate in our relationships, how we can bring more of ourselves to our interactions, and how this will ultimately help us deal creatively and confidently with the unknowns we face.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2021.

The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Winter.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

Campaign Goals

Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)
Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover edition
Tier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.

 

About the Author

Dr. Annemarie Spadafore is Founder and Managing Partner of PowerLab; her ability to combine research from the most well-respected institutions with her own insightful, mind-expanding perspectives has enabled her to provide captivating public talks and highly valued executive coaching services to C-Suite and senior executives in the world’s most demanding, high-stakes, and exacting professions.

She wrote this book because she could never find the absolute perfect book to recommend to her clients that would help them gain perspective on their business, professional, and relationship dilemmas. She's spent her entire career thinking about business dilemmas, particularly the dilemma of making the most out of human potential in the workplace, and the dilemma of developing innovative responses to our greatest challenges; it was such a wonderful discovery for her to find an approach that can actually help us be our best selves in the face of these dilemmas. And that is why she is so excited to share more of this information with you!

When she's not exhausting her eyeballs with research, or having a blast going on amazing journeys of discovery with clients, she likes to spend the balance of her time perfecting her backstroke at the pool, resisting the soulful entreaties of her two black Labradors, Juno and Benjamin Bear, and continuing to learn more (through repeated exposure) about the individual genius of her wise and creative husband, Steve. She indulges her creative side further by singing (she has a smoky Soprano II voice that works well in several genres) and attending as many concerts as her bank account and schedule affords.

For more information, you can connect with Dr. Annemarie Spadafore at annemarie@powerlabpartners.com and

https://www.linkedin.com/in/annemariespadafore/
https://www.facebook.com/annemarie.spadafore
https://twitter.com/IngenuityCoach 
https://www.instagram.com/ingenuitycoach

 

Risks & Challenges
The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help
Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!
I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days).

Here's how:

At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window, as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit) 

Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.

When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry!

Please use #TheresOnlyIinTeam and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!

Tag:

LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/annemariespadafore/
Instragram - https://www.instagram.com/ingenuitycoach  / @newdegreepress
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/annemarie.spadafore / @NewDegreePress
Twitter - https://twitter.com/IngenuityCoach / @NewDegreePress

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Warmest regards,
Annemarie

In this book, you'll learn about relationship systems and how they impact our performance and our results. You’ll learn about how we can make the most of these systems to bring out the  genius in all of us, while driving creative and innovative responses to large-scale challenges and obstacles.You'll hear stories such as...

A story straight from the U.S. military on what it really takes to build trust with others
Examples of executives who are courageous enough to lead differently and who are getting incredible results
Stories that further illuminate groundbreaking research on the brain and our responses to others

 
You will love this book if you are prepared for the amazing empowerment that comes from really inhabiting your strengths and owning who you are. You’ll also love it if you might be a little disenchanted with the insincerity of other approaches in influencing, motivating, and collaborating with others, and if you are hungry to learn what actually works!

If you are sometimes puzzled by the behavior of people in business environments, or any professional environment or workplace, this book is for you
If you sometimes feel that other people don’t really understand or appreciate your strengths, this book is for you
If you are less-than-stoked by some of the behavior of your family members or friends, this book is for you
If you just like learning new things, including having ‘aha’ moments, particularly in regard to the fascinating study of human behavior, this book is for you
If you are just generally annoyed by others at times, this book is (especially) for you!

 
There’s Only ‘I’ in Team is a nonfiction book that speaks both to business executives and any person who is courageous enough to upgrade their thinking about relationships, and who wants to look at collaboration and fully utilizing their talents, strengths, and gifts in a new way.
There’s never been a better time for this book. We have all faced a massive amount of upheaval and change, and this is an amazing opportunity to rethink how we operate in our relationships, how we can bring more of ourselves to our interactions, and how this will ultimately help us deal creatively and confidently with the unknowns we face.
 
What I Need & What You'll Get
This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2021.
The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Winter.
I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).
You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
And much more!

 
Campaign Goals
Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover editionTier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.
 
About the Author
Dr. Annemarie Spadafore is Founder and Managing Partner of PowerLab; her ability to combine research from the most well-respected institutions with her own insightful, mind-expanding perspectives has enabled her to provide captivating public talks and highly valued executive coaching services to C-Suite and senior executives in the world’s most demanding, high-stakes, and exacting professions.
She wrote this book because she could never find the absolute perfect book to recommend to her clients that would help them gain perspective on their business, professional, and relationship dilemmas. She's spent her entire career thinking about business dilemmas, particularly the dilemma of making the most out of human potential in the workplace, and the dilemma of developing innovative responses to our greatest challenges; it was such a wonderful discovery for her to find an approach that can actually help us be our best selves in the face of these dilemmas. And that is why she is so excited to share more of this information with you!
When she's not exhausting her eyeballs with research, or having a blast going on amazing journeys of discovery with clients, she likes to spend the balance of her time perfecting her backstroke at the pool, resisting the soulful entreaties of her two black Labradors, Juno and Benjamin Bear, and continuing to learn more (through repeated exposure) about the individual genius of her wise and creative husband, Steve. She indulges her creative side further by singing (she has a smoky Soprano II voice that works well in several genres) and attending as many concerts as her bank account and schedule affords.For more information, you can connect with Dr. Annemarie Spadafore at annemarie@powerlabpartners.com and
https://www.linkedin.com/in/annemariespadafore/https://www.facebook.com/annemarie.spadaforehttps://twitter.com/IngenuityCoach https://www.instagram.com/ingenuitycoach
 
Risks & ChallengesThe biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.
 
Other Ways You Can HelpNot everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days).
Here's how:
At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window, as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit) 
Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.
When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry!
Please use #TheresOnlyIinTeam and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!

story:
Chi è Rick DuFer?

Rick DuFer è l'unico e vero filosofo di YouTube.
Se non lo conosci c'è qualcosa che non va. 

Che cos'è FiloSoFarSoGood?

Si tratta della più bella rubrica di YouTube, in cui si raccontano le idee filosofiche che stanno dietro la nostra cultura POP: serie TV, film, fumetti, musica! Che filosofi stanno dietro Breaking Bad? Non lo sai?
Per questo hai bisogno di FiloSoFarSoGood! 

Perché questa campagna Indiegogo?

Questa campagna serve a diffondere il messaggio che: "La filosofia va presa di petto"! E quale miglior modo che girare per le strade del tuo paese e della tua città con questi filosofi sul petto? Foucault, Kant, Bergson, Spinoza, Nietzsche, Darwin, Leibniz, Freud, nella splendida illustrazione dell'artista Marzio Mariani!
Devi avere un caos dentro di te per indossare una maglietta così. 

Verranno stampate 100 magliette per mostrare ai tuoi amici che la filosofia è una cosa per gente fica. 

Perché dovresti contribuire alla campagna?

Il motivo è semplice: sostenere e diffondere la mia attività divulgativa. Se lo farai, come ringraziamento riceverai la T-Shirt FiloSoFarSoGood con la straordinaria illustrazione dell'artista Marzio Mariani! 
Ho pensato di suddividere in questo modo la campagna, sulla base di quello che ti sentirai di donare: 
  1. Donando 5 euro sosterrai la campagna e verrai citato in un video di FiloSoFarSoGood, ma se in futuro volessi ordinare la maglietta, le spese di spedizione saranno a mio carico; 
  2. Donando 10 euro, la maglietta di FiloSoFarSoGood sarà tua, dovrai soltanto pagare le spese di spedizione oppure incontrarmi per averla; 
  3. Donando 15 euro, ti spedirò la maglietta di FiloSoFarSoGood direttamente a casa! Ti basterà comunicarmi l'indirizzo; 
  4. Donando 30 euro, ti spedirò a casa la maglietta di FiloSoFarSoGood e UNA COPIA DEDICATA del mio romanzo "I pianeti impossibili"! Questa opzione è dedicata solo a chi la filosofia la prende davvero di petto! :D 
  5. Nulla vi vieta di donare di più, ogni centesimo sarà usato per migliorare e ampliare le attività di divulgazione del mio canale! 

Operazione Trasparenza

La campagna ha un traguardo fissato di 600 euro ed è mirata a sostenere l'attività del canale. Questo significa che, nel caso il traguardo non venisse raggiunto, le somme versate saranno restituite per intero. Ogni centesimo eccedente i 600 euro verrà reinvestito per migliorare l'attività divulgativa del canale!
I costi da affrontare per raggiungere questo traguardo sono i seguenti: 
  • stampa di 100 magliette: circa 410 euro, IVA inclusa 
  • spese per il logo: 150 euro 
  • commissioni PayPal e altre spese: 40 euro circa 

Se non puoi contribuire

Non ti devi preoccupare, un modo c'è sempre: condividi sui tuoi social questa campagna, invita le persone a conoscere la mia attività divulgativa, dai il tuo aiuto nel far conoscere FiloSoFarSoGood e le altre rubriche del mio canale invitandole a iscriversi e sostenere il mio progetto!

story:
Why do these things always end with me shoeless and screaming?


The Squirrel!Terror stories were among the most popular on my blog. I started writing them during a pretty dark time in my life, and before I knew it, I was breathlessly involved with Neo, Romeo, Juliet, and all the other critters of the Kingdom of Backyard. The posts were lost when my site was hacked, but I've managed to rebuild them with the help of a few fans.

Why?

Because my fabulous Readers kept asking if I'd put them in a book. And I like making my Readers happy.

The initial goal for this campaign will defray the (already-incurred) costs of paying an editor, buying stock art for the cover, and conversion into ebook and paper file formats, as well as the (yet to be incurred) costs of getting ebook and paper copies into distribution and sending out rewards (there are some great ones, and postage is a killer nowadays). Anything over the amount of this campaign will go to the costs of future ebooks--like Selene, or the Adventures of Napoleon!Squirrel. (Or maybe even Fred and George; there's no shortage of stuff I could release this way.)


Since I've already paid the aforementioned editor and for the costs of formatting/conversion, everything is pretty much done. I'm doing this mostly for costs already incurred, to defray what I've already sunk into the project. I don't foresee any setbacks--if this doesn't fund, it'll just take me longer to get Squirrel!Terror out.


UPDATE: Wow. Just...wow. We're fully funded! We do have some perks left, if you want them, and any contributions from that will go toward other projects like Selene, etc., or extending SquirrelTerror's reach.


Thank you. Thank you all. I'm absolutely blown away by this.

story:
Our mission is to provoke dialogue and encourage creativity, literacy and self-sufficiency by providing opportunities for under-resourced youth and adults in Oakland to write, publish and perform works about their lives.

Lead by a team of experienced writing instructors, over 300 local residents took dozens of free introductory writing classes in poetry, fiction and memoir from Feb to April. Many will be published in an anthology due out in a couple months.

After a successful run of 14 workshops, 6 seminars and 2 public readings in 4 Oakland sites, aspiring writers are still contacting us to find out when the next round of free classes will be.

A majority of our participants are women and people of color in their 20s, 30s and 40s. Most have stated they would not be able to take a creative writing class if it was not free-of-charge. Unfortunately, our starter grant has run out and we don’t have the funding to keep it going.

But you can help us offer summer workshops! $7,000 will pay for a project coordinator and 3 instructors to teach 3-4 five-week workshops during June, when youth and adults will be searching for productive and creative ways to spend their time.

Here’s what one participant said about her experience:

“Oakland Word is a rarity among community writing programs. It allows writers of all strengths and skills to work under the tutelage of an established writer, receive a refresher course on the elements of story and writer’s craft, and to produce new work through a series of writing exercises—all for free! As a person who has long relied on community-based writing workshops to continue writing in my harried life as a public school teacher, I feel privileged to have been able to participate in a workshop right here in my beloved Oakland.”

story:
Attention Radical Revolutionaries!

Do you believe the world is messed up? Collectively insane?

Help us accelerate the spread of a radical idea that could change everything!

Tony Wright, an independent researcher and author of Left in the Dark: The Biological Origins of the Fall From Grace, contends that the human brain began to degrade about 200,000 years ago. Something horrible went wrong, and we haven't recovered from the catastrophe.

For more than 15 years, Tony has been working to bring together disparate data from science and religion to form a coherent picture about the evolution of the human brain. His theory is nothing less than radical. His work and message could be called, â€œThe Radical Revolution to Reconstruct the Human Brain.â€

If his theory is right and stands up to intense scrutiny, eradicating the madness that has plagued humanity for thousands of years is suddenly a very real choice. The challenge now is bringing this radical message to wider attention. Imagine reading a story about science and the history of humankind that opens the door to a healthier, more peaceful, kinder world. Could you be inspired by such a story?

If you are a Radical Revolutionary for humanity and the planet, we need your support! It's time to write a new book to tell a more compelling story and appeal to a wider audience. We also need to update Left in the Dark, which is more suitable for a technical audience.


Our goal is to raise $14,000 to:


1) Hire Andrew Crofts, an acclaimed author and ghostwriter, to produce a high-quality selling synopsis for a new book to appeal to the general public. Andrew will then use his connections to solicit a publishing deal wherein Andrew writes the new book, The Missing Link (working title).


2) Hire a professional editor to update Left in the Dark (third edition), geared toward a technical audience.


Will you help us raise $14,000? Check out the great perks to the right and donate today!




The Back Story

For more than 15 years, researcher and author Tony Wright has been piecing together academic findings from numerous disciplines, ranging from neuroscience, endocrinology, nutrition, anthropology, primatology, pharmacology and developmental biology to botany, palaeontology, zoology and behavioural sciences. With the help of writer Graham Gynn, Left in the Dark is the result of his work, in which the chemistry of our brain and nervous system is scrutinised, and its evolution traced all the way back to the ancestral tropical forest.

The authors point to a symbiotic relationship between our forebears and the forestâ€™s flowering plants, whose fruit gave us a uniquely hormone-rich nutritional environment in which to evolve. In their opinion, this had particularly significant implications for our endocrine system â€“ the system by which hormones govern many of our bodyâ€™s functions and the development of our brain.

This complex biochemistry was lost to us when the last of our human ancestors were separated from the forest environment roughly 200,000 years ago. According to Wright and Gynn, we thereby lost our optimum â€œdesign conditionsâ€, resulting in a net loss of critically important abilities â€“ notably for harmonious coexistence with each other and our planet.

Although we appear to have successfully survived, the authors argue that, rather than being at the pinnacle of our abilities (technological know-how and industrial-scale utilisation of resources notwithstanding), we are in fact a shadow of what we could be.

Specifically, the authors show that our right brain hemisphere has retained particular strengths which are both generally untapped, and likely to be precisely what is needed at this time when natural resources (from fuel to land and food) are stretched, with the ensuing potential for conflict and hardship. Basing their work on careful analysis of original scientific papers, with simplicity and elegance, they demonstrate how our left hemisphere, which dominates our current thinking and planning, is â€œin the darkâ€, subjectively unaware that it is has lost much of its own unique capacity.

A fascinating picture thus emerges, reminiscent of the â€œgolden ageâ€ common to many mythologies: of a latent human capacity for co-operative, peaceful behaviour which could be intrinsically linked with greatly enhanced abilities of understanding, perception and creative thinking. Unlocking these in all of us is a tantalising prospectâ€¦

Interested? We are!

In fact, the unlocking of this potential is something we would like to see being prioritised. The implication is that we may be neurologically compromised, affecting both how we perceive ourselves/each other and the world we live in â€“ in other words, our very consciousness. If we are in effect suffering from a delusional mind, then repairing this damage could radically change the way we think and the decisions we make.

The prospects we face as a species and the impact on our paradisiacal home often seem very grim: re-establishing our own neural integrity could provide the very thinking we need to find adequate solutions â€“ solutions that would benefit the whole planet, not just a minority; solutions based on empathy and compassion instead of fear and control.

In other words, in order to repair the outer damage, we think it may be critical to repair the inner neural damage. For this to happen, we also think widespread public interest may be key. This is why highly acclaimed ghostwriter Andrew Crofts has been asked to present the current findings from Left in the Dark in a widely accessible style.


Please donate today and spread the word!

Help us take this radical, life-changing work out into the wider world. Also, please use the share links above to spread the word about our fundraising campaign on social networks, Web sites and blogs. 


If you can help in any other way, we would love to hear from you at the contact or support page at www.leftinthedark.org.uk (where further links can be found).


To sum up, the primary goal of the books is to draw attention to the increasingly supported proposal that the progressive failure of our neural system to fully develop is the underlying cause of our collective insanity.


And if the mountain of evidence that must exist if the condition were real is brought into our collective awareness in a recognisable format, then it will require/demand urgent action.


Who in their right mind would choose to be imprisoned by the increasingly primitive neural architecture of a hormonally retarded brain, when simply restoring the structural integrity that was once "normal" is guaranteed to effect a massive change in who or what we think we are and our collective behaviour?


We need your help to push this message out to a wider audience NOW.


Thank you for your support!


P.S. Are you wondering about the Kickstarter project we ran last year?


This IndieGoGo project has the same basic objectives as 'Molecules of Madness', which is to create a much more accessible translation of the theory outlined in Left in the Dark and deliver it to a mainstream audience.

With the promise of mainstream media support, last year we launched an ambitious project to finance a major film collaboration with award-winning documentary filmmaker David Malone. The Kickstarter project went live, but unfortunately, and perhaps not surprisingly, the mainstream media went AWOL.

Interest in our work continues to develop, but without finding a route into mainstream awareness, it may well take many years to gain real traction (which our world cannot afford). We launched this IndieGoGo campaign to fund the books, allowing us to capture mainstream attention at a fraction of the cost of a documentary.


For more information about Tony's work and the basic theory, see:

http://beyond-belief.org.uk/

http://leftinthedark.org.uk/

The implication is that we may be neurologically compromised, affecting both how we perceive ourselves/each other and the world we live in â€“ in other words, our very consciousness. If we are in effect suffering from a delusional mind, then repairing this damage could radically change the way we think and the decisions we make.The prospects we face as a species and the impact on our paradisiacal home often seem very grim: re-establishing our own neural integrity could provide the very thinking we need to find adequate solutions â€“ solutions that would benefit the whole planet, not just a minority; solutions based on empathy and compassion instead of fear and control.In other words, in order to repair the outer damage, we think it may be critical to repair the inner neural damage. For this to happen, we also think widespread public interest may be key. This is why highly acclaimed ghostwriter Andrew Crofts has been asked to present the current findings from Left in the Dark in a widely accessible style.

Please donate today and spread the word!Help us take this radical, life-changing work out into the wider world. Also, please use the share links above to spread the 
word about our fundraising campaign on social networks, Web sites and 
blogs. 

If you can help in any other way, we would love to hear from you at the contact or support page at www.leftinthedark.org.uk (where further links can be found).

To sum up, the primary goal of the books is to draw 
attention to the increasingly supported proposal that the progressive 
failure of our neural system to fully develop is the underlying cause of
 our collective insanity. 

And if the mountain of evidence that must exist if
 the condition were real is brought into our collective awareness in a 
recognisable format, then it will require/demand urgent action. 

Who in their right mind would choose to be imprisoned 
by the increasingly primitive neural architecture of a hormonally 
retarded brain, when simply restoring the structural integrity that was 
once "normal" is guaranteed to effect a massive change in who or what we
 think we are and our collective behaviour? 

We need your help to push this message out to a wider audience NOW.

Thank you for your support!

P.S. Are you wondering about the Kickstarter project we ran last year?

This IndieGoGo project has the same basic objectives as 'Molecules
      of Madness', which is to create a much more accessible translation of the theory
      outlined in Left in the Dark and deliver it to a mainstream audience.
      With the promise of mainstream media support, last year we      launched an ambitious project to finance a major film collaboration with
      award-winning documentary filmmaker David Malone. The Kickstarter project went live, but unfortunately, and perhaps not surprisingly,
      the mainstream media went AWOL.Interest in our work continues to develop, but without finding a route into
      mainstream awareness, it may well take many years to gain real traction (which our world cannot afford). We launched this IndieGoGo campaign to fund the books, allowing us to capture mainstream attention at a fraction of the cost of a documentary.

For more information about Tony's work and the basic theory, see:http://beyond-belief.org.uk/
http://leftinthedark.org.uk/

story:
Short Summary

        Hello, My name is Miguel Rodriguez and I run Wasp Nest Videos, an entertainment group that does Videos, photos, and articles in hopes to bring everyone a bit of entertainment throughout their day. The partners of WNV (Wasp Nest Videos) and I are planning on releasing an EBook That will be dedicated to the people who suffer through homelessness here in California. California has the highest number of homeless families and individuals of all the US states and in a privileged Country like America, the numbers are unacceptable! According to the last assessment by the Housing and Urban development organization over 130,000 people are homeless in California at any given time; over 20,000 of which are children or youths completely on their own!

Our idea is to put a book out there that will not only tell the stories of people who have been in this terrible situation but the stories of those who do their very best to help the masses of homeless that need and deserve all our help. We will also be doing a year long web series on our YouTube channel to keep the problem, cause, and EBook in the public eye. All the net profit from the book will go to helping homeless shelters and groups who are already helping homeless!

What We Need & What You Get

        In order to make this book and series good enough to attract buyers and of course readers; we need to raise money for better equipment and the copyright for the EBook itself as well as for travel to interview as many organizations and individuals as possible to ask them of their experiences and their tips for how everyone can help out personally. The equipment in question is:

An imac for faster editing to do the shoots and videos in a timely manner

A Panasonic GH4 which will be the main camera used for the photo shoots as well as any filming in the near future

3 Panasonic lenses to give variety to the shoots and depth to the book; the lenses are a 14 mm prime lens, a 14 mm to 42 mm zoom lens, and a  45 to 200 mm zoom lens

A Rode video shotgun mic with stand and 25 ft cable for better sound quality in videos and interviews

A 3 point soft lighting kit for studio lighting

The total of the items listed above is more than 4000 dollars combined but with that minimum Wasp Nest Videos can cover the rest and expenses for interviews so we can start immediately.

          For your help of helping us reach our goals; we have listed out an extensive list of perks including a raffle for 2 free event photo shoots for anything you may need, discounts on photo shoots for any occasions, and free promotion for businesses who donate and recognition in the EBook for groups and individuals as well who donate extra generously to the project. For every 1000 dollars we raise above our minimum we will raffle off an extra event shoot

The Event packages include

6 hours of photography service from myself and a lighting assistant

A free 1 hour photo shoot up to a year before or after the event

All photos edited and given to you on a flash drive

A movie montage of your event on a DVD

An 11' by 14' wall canvass of your favorite photo

30, 4 by 6 prints

20, 5 by 7 prints and

5, 8 by 10 prints

You can win a package like this for as little a 5 dollars! 

*all photo shoots must be in Bakersfield, CA but if it is in California a fee can be added for travel

The entire perk list is as follows:

5 dollars

A thank you email and your picture in the donor photo book on Facebook
1 entry to the giveaway
(A 5 dollar savings)


15 dollars

The previous perks and 15% off your next 1 hour shoot
A monthly news letter letting you know how the EBook is doing and where the money is going and who it is helping
2 extra give away entries
(An 18 dollar savings)

40 dollars

All previous perks and 75% off your next 1 hour photo shoot
15% off your next event photo shoot booking
8 extra giveaway entries
Free Easter quick shoot on March 1st, 2015
( A 130 dollar saving!)

60 dollars

All previous perks and 90% off your next 1 hour photo shoot
25% off your next event shoot booking AND 100 free thank you for attending postcards with your choice of photo on it
10 extra giveaway entries
(Over 200 dollar savings!)

140 dollars

All previous perks and a free 1 hour photo shoot PLUS 10% all 1 hour shoots you book during 2015
Your name(or business's name), picture, and short bio in the Help the Homeless CA digital book
Your picture(or business info) in a VIP donor photo book on the Facebook page and in the monthly newsletter
(A minimum of 225 dollar savings!)


225 dollars

All the previous perks and the Weekend advertisement package for any business, group, or organization that wants it.

The Impact

This is are idea on how to help those who need it most in our community; if we can show others that helping small like purchasing an EBook can build up to bigger things then maybe we can slowly start to make the world a better place! Together we can truly make a difference and it starts with you. Your impact will be tremendous to not just the people you'd be helping by donating but to our organization as well; we have been wanting to give back to the community and this would really  be a dream come true for us all!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    An amazing way to help would be to just spread the word to others who may also want to help but not know how. Without a doubt every dollar helps and your help spreading the word could make all the difference!! Together we can make a difference in our society and for the generations to follow.

story:
Who is Maizie?


She came second last as a child, to a family of 10..not including her parents. Yet, somehow she was the bravest to venture out and ultimately become a matriarch. She learned what it was to overcome severe racism and prejudice. She learned what it meant at the time, to be a woman. She learned that she would need to be more than good (in fact triple so) than her white counterparts, in order to get any recognition or acknowledgment from the world at large. She learned of emigration and traveled further than others expected. She learned of intimate love, and surrendered to what she wasn't sure she could trust. She learned about immigration and brought her family to where she was. She learned of motherhood and career and of being superwoman, and she executed them well. 


She learned all of this and synthesized it...into...love. Niece's and nephew's...extended family, children that were not her own, she helped to raise...She gave of herself. She gave examples of what love is and who a person could be with it.

She was far from perfect...and she gave her love, because she knew it was the one thing that she would always be able to give. And she proved that when you give love...just for the sake of giving, it's incredible how much of it you will receive of it in return. "Mama Maize"..."Sistah Maize"...."Cousin Maizie"..."Auntie Maizie"...I have heard these titles for so long, ringing with such love...I must admit..Maizie Elizabeth Carter Bradshaw, you are my inspiration, my love and my heart. I love you mom. I love you for everything! And I promise to continue to spread love in honour of you.

Always in my heart,

Mikki

What We Need & What You Get

My family has pooled together enough funds for the casket and plot but we are asking for your help to have enough for the tombstone.

We have graciously had some art - paintings and prints donated to give away as perks for your contributions.

The Impact

Being able to honour Maizie's life means so much to everyone who had the pleasure of knowing her.

Other Ways You Can Help

Every penny helps... but if you simply can't donate then please spread the word of this campaign. Share as widely as you can.

story:
What We Are Doing

Two.5 is raising funds to cover final production costs for On The Same Page: an innovative app template that displays image/text collaborations digitally.

Inspired by the 12 sets of photo triptychs and stories two.5 created for Dirty Laundry, On The Same Page keeps both images and text on the screen together at all times. 

On The Same Page creates an HTML based web app – which means it looks and feels like a typical smartphone or tablet app but is downloadable from anywhere on the web.  The application’s stripped back design and layout is devoted purely to the experience of viewing text and image collaborations. 

What we've designed for On The Same Page functions as an app template. Which means that other people can use it to publish their own work using a licensed copy of our software files. We’ll be using it to publish our photo-story series, Dirty Laundry, as well as our next project "Guilty Pleasures" and more to come after that: it’s a gift that keeps on giving!

Scroll to the end of this campaign story for some mock-up images of how the app will look/work.


What We Need

Thanks to an R&D grant from the British Council joint with the Arts Council England, we have completed the development stage and the first stage of production. In order to complete the project we are reaching out to our friends, family and wider acquaintances to help us raise the remaining funds necessary for our brilliant friends at ADQ Design to complete the application template and make it ready for our users.

Here’s how it breaks down:

Creating the software files for the app (inc. producing a PDF user guide so other people can license the software & publish their own work) will cost  £3,500 / $5722

BUT we have already £920 / $1504 (hurrah!)

Remaining production costs  = £2,580 / $4218

...add on printing & postage costs for the perks (est. £150 / $245)

... and Indiegogo fees at 9%* (£245.70 / $400)

Our Goal = £2,975.70 / $4864

*Fees will DROP to 4% if we meet our goal, meaning more money for Art. Anything we raise in excess of our goal will go towards R&D for two.5's next project, Guilty Pleasures.


How You Can Help

It would only take 120 people donating £25 / $40 each (that’s about two cocktails in London or a nice lunch in New York) to reach our target. Please forward our campaign information on so that we can complete our goal.

You can also use the Indiegogo share tools to tweet about us, update your Facebook status, or mention us in your blog… all we want for Easter is a successful end to our campaign and we need your help!


What You Get

As a thank you for investing in our art and making our Dirty Laundry dreams come true we’ve created a series of exclusive perks for you awesome people. Everyone who donates will receive a public thank you on the two.5 two.5 on Facebook and Twitter account, but the more you give the more you receive, from limited edition postcard sets to a professionally recorded audio story from the Dirty Laundry series (recorded by sound engineer Danielle Warman at Chiller Sound, read by professional voice actors Michael Kendrick & Lisette Silva and introduced by a personalised dedication from Viccy & Samantha), or even a licensed copy of the On The Same Page software files. 

Look at our campaign gallery for a full, illustrated list of our perks categories, featuring two.5's favourite model/anchor-man, Alex Dunbar. 


Who We Are

The Artists

Two.5 is a collaboration between Samantha Silver and Viccy Adams. We’ve been friends for over 10 years and artistic collaborators for nearly 3, despite living in different timezones and on different continents. Our goal in working together is to experiment with combining our respective skills and using them in a way that is fresh, exciting and easily shared digitally.

Samantha is a Brooklyn based photographer/filmmaker. A member of Local 600 Cinematographers Guild as well as Con Artist Art Collective, her photography and short films have been shown in galleries and on the streets of the 5 Boroughs and abroad. She has an MA in film production from Bristol University and works in the film and TV industry.

Viccy is a UK based published short story writer. A former Leverhulme Trust artist in residence at Edinburgh University, she works part-time as a Research Associate in creative writing at Newcastle University. She has a PhD in Creative Writing and is involved with a number of community-focussed writing projects in the UK.

The Technical Team

ADQ is a small design studio with a large skill-set formed by Mel Ashby and Asier de Quadra, both senior designers with more than 25 years combined experience in print and digital design. Established in 2011 and working from Whitley Bay in the North East of England, ADQ has a track record of creating interactive web applications.

Mel is a senior designer and web developer with a background in journalism (BBC Worldwide, Channel 4, The Big Issue, The Times). An expert in CSS/HTML and all things web development and digital publishing, she is and advocate for user-friendly digital experiences.

Asier’s background is in architecture and fine art with 12 year experience in graphic designer, including behind the scenes coding for rich internet applications. He holds an MA in Design with distinction from Northumbria University. 


The Impact

By contributing to our campaign, you’ll be making the three years of artistic and administrative effort we’ve invested in the Dirty Laundry series worthwhile. 

You’ll be helping two emerging artists see the first major display of their collaboration shared with a global audience, in a custom-designed digital setting. As well as the financial help needed to cover final production costs, you’re giving us a vote of confidence that will fuel us onto the next step in our artistic careers.

Most of all, you’ll be helping us make a damn fine piece of art, and one that keeps on giving; once we have built the architecture of On The Same Page we will be able to continue to use it as the basis for future projects. And so can you: by donating £300 / $490 or above, you'll receive a licensed copy of our software files and PDF guide so that you can publish your own content with our template.


Sneaky preview

Here's a mock-up to help explain how the app will look/work, featuring some of the images from Dirty Laundry.

story:
Right now there are 20 million overweight and obese men in the UK. That's 40 million manboobs too many and we want to do something about it. That's why we would love your support to launch Man V Fat: a free, monthly digital magazine that is designed to help men lose weight... 


Your support would also launch the partner Man V Fat website...

What Will Man V Fat Give Its Readers? 

Man V Fat is a full colour, 100 page cutting-edge digital magazine that arrives direct to your smartphone or tablet and a state of the art community website. Think of Man V Fat as your non-stop kick up the arse delivered direct to your laptop, iPad or Nexus which will inspire, entertain, inform and motivate you so that you can finally beat fat. 

Our mission is to bring you: 

  • Inspiration and Motivation - we are going to cheer every single pound our readers lose, bring you incredible success stories, weight loss diaries and amplify all of those reasons you have for wanting to beat fat. 
  • Support and Information - all the news, gadgets and developments that can keep you at the cutting edge of weight loss. 
  • Food and Drink - ideas, recipes and suggestions of things that you can get down your neck. If you love your food and drink but want to lose weight, then you'll love this.
  • Challenges - both weight loss and fitness challenges with an array of different difficulties designed to help get you to your goal. 
  • Features - Is the latest diet a load of nonsense? How are your mates making you fat? Can you fit healthy living alongside working? Interviews with inspirational blokes from all walks of life who have something to share about losing weight. 
  • No Bulls**t - it's so easy to get lost in the arguments around weight loss (is paleo good? Will 5:2 kill you? Am I in starvation mode?) so we're promising a no bulls**t approach. We'll use science, common-sense and bona fide experts to cut through all of the nonsense and explain the jargon. 
  • A Laugh - you're losing weight, not your sense of humour. 
  • Community - the website is the always-on partner to the magazine. Build your profile, read posts, get expert advice and meet other men who are losing weight (then steal all their good ideas). 

Our commitment is to make all of this free for our readers. We want to help as many people as we can and despite the extra challenges this brings, we know it's the right thing to do. 

There are three things you can do to launch Man V Fat and help overweight men everywhere:

1. Buy A Perk

We've got a range of perks from prestige early access to the magazine and site, t-shirts, phone calls from the editor, a range of exclusive advertising options and even crocheted manboobs for our wonderful supporters. Even if you can just spare a pound you will be giving life to a project that could mean the difference between someone beating fat, or not. Please click on Contribute and launch this project.  

2. Get Your Free Copy Of The Magazine

Add your email address and you will get emailed the second the magazine is on the (digital) shelves. The more subscribers we have, the more powerful we become and the more we can use that to help our readers. 

3. Share Man V Fat

If you know and love a guy who wants to lose weight - send them this project. Share it on Facebook, talk about it on Twitter, picture it on Instagram, post it on YouTube. Ask your followers and friends if you think Man V Fat deserves to be launched...

Who Is Behind Man V Fat?

My name is Andrew Shanahan and I'm an award-winning writer, editor and publisher. I've spent the last three years creating and building Staggered - a free website to help men with their weddings. It started from nothing and rapidly became the world's biggest wedding community for grooms, best men and fathers of the bride. By 2012 we were helping over a million guys a year, leading to a successful sale in 2013.

As a journalist I've written for The Guardian, The Times, The Independent, The Good Food Guide, Metro, Arena, the BBC and edited digital publications for an array of clients. For Man V Fat I'm working with a hand-picked team of graphic designers, web designers, journalists, photographers, scientists, fitness experts and nutritionists to put together a cutting-edge publication.

Man V Fat is personally important to me. I have been overweight for most of my life. It has been the single biggest source of misery and hardship in my life, and I speak as a Stoke City fan. In June 2011 I was getting out of bed and I took a "guttie" - a selfie of my grotesque gut and manboobs. Man V Fat was born at that moment. It took the better part of three years (and I'm still not quite Jason Statham) but my guttie gif now looks like this:

If I can help other men to lose weight and enjoy life more then Man V Fat will be a success. 

What Will We Do With Your Money?

All the costs will go towards creating the first issue of Man V Fat and the website. If we raise over the target then it will go towards funding the second issue. If we do really well then we have some Stretch Goal ideas that are straight out of the crazy jar. Running costs for the magazine are low and the projection is that we will be able to make the magazine profitable within a short period of time, providing enough people support its launch.  

The Impact

I'm not asking for your money and support so that I can realise my goal. I'm asking for this money to help other men realise theirs. If you want to lose weight then please fund this project. If you know someone who desperately wants to beat fat then please fund this project. I believe Man V Fat can make a massive difference to the lives of those 20 million men and it all begins with your support.

story:
Short Summary

We are searching 4 corners of the world over 10 months to find truly inspiring stories, stories of overcoming adversity and stories of success. We are literally driving 30,000 km to find these hidden sources of inspiration. We are leaving behind our jobs and security to do something what we always wanted to do… to truly feel alive and to be inspired by the people we will meet on the way. 

For 10 months, we will be searching, filming and broadcasting sustainable solutions to world's problems from South Korea to South Africa overland.

Who Are We?:

  • Steven Lee (Impact Investment Professional who is co-founder of Wheel Wishers, has over 10 years of experience in social enterprises, impact investing, commercial business operation and finance. He has bachelors degree in Mechanical Engineering from Cooper Union, Master of Aerospace Engineering from Georgia Institute of Technology and MBA from INSEAD)
  • Marije Mellegers (Humanitarian Legal Professional and has 8 years of experience in the development sector including governmental and non-governmental organizations in Asia, Middle East, Africa and Europe. Some of the organizations she worked with include the United Nations and the Government of the Netherlands. She is co-founder of Wheel Wishers. She is a trained human rights lawyer and has Masters degree in Humanitarian Assistance.)

Why this project?:

We have lived and worked in over 10 countries in our lives. We have withness amzing stories of individuals making difference. We believe as a society, we can learn from these inpiring stories. We seek to bring these untold stories to general public so people can be inspired to do something positive for this world.

What is this project mean for us:

  • This is about personal and spiritual growth, saying no to stupidity and becoming more aware of our surroundings.
  • It is about learning things that matter in life and about enjoying every day things that we have forgotten to notice.
  • It is about to be able to tell other people to follow their dream without being hypocritical.
  • It is about being positive and by trying to do something positive.

What kind of stories are we looking for?:

How Do We find Organizations (VIDEO: Click Below to View)


Where do we go?:

How Do We Capture Stories to Show YOU (VIDEO: Click Below to View)

Project Summary:

  • 30,000+ KM Drive
  • 20+ countries (South Korea, Russia, Mongolia, Kazakstan, Kyrgyzstan, Romania, Turkey, Egypt, Sudan, Kenya, Ethiopia, Tanzania, Mozambique, South Africa, Others)
  • 3 Continents : Asia, Europe, Africa
  • 100+ Field Visits of NGOs / CSR cases / Social Enterprises
  • Website: www.WheelWishers.org

Where does the money go?:

We are raising fund for Wheel Wishers Non Profit Organization (501c3 Public Charity) Wheel Wishers is established with the mission to alleviate human, animal and environmental sufferings in the world because we believe that these sufferings equally deserve our attention in creating a better world for next generations to come. "Search the World to find Inspiring Stories" is project under Wheel Wishers

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising final 10,000 USD or about 7498.50 Euros to make this project happen. The money will be used for Petrol, Visa fees and Equipments.

We are looking to generate public interest and support. Join our project and come with us! 

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize that not everyone is able to financially contribute, but if you believe in our cause and would like to support our project you can help us also by: 

  1. “Liking” our Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/wheelwishers  
  2. Telling your friends about our website (www.wheelwishers.org) and our project!
  3. Joining our mailing list for updates on new media content for you to discover. Sign up here: http://www.wheelwishers.org/mail
