story:
We want to introduce you to the revolution of the news: Papglide is a new way to think about the world of information.

Our journey starts with Papglide Bird’s Nest: it is an innovative website and application - the first global and social newspaper - where the users are both readers and journalists. Just a few steps for the creation of an account and you will be able to write and share your articles on Papglide!

Our aim is create a global space where people can express their own ideas and share what is really happening in the world; in an easy, free and independent way. 


You can start writing articles on Papglide with just the creation of an account! You can create it using your e-mail address or your Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Pinterest or Vkontact account.

Once you have your own account you will be able to write articles and see the ones you have already written, with the related evaluations and comments. Moreover, using our indexing tools or the information given with your registration - such as place of residence or interest - you will be able to customise your newspaper, shaping it according to what you want to read about.

It's easy: choose the type of news, which we call glider, and begin to write!

Each glider has at least a title and text, an image, a category, a location and (of course) a journalist. Once submitted, anyone can confirm the news, share it, report a problem and vote on it.


Map - On Papglide the news is shown on an interactive, easy-to-use map. The stories are ordered on the map according to the votes, confirmations, and views, but you can also choose the type of news you want to read, the most interesting categories or zoom into the map to access the local news. Papglide will be the place where all news will have global visibility.

Timeline - Thanks to our timeline, you can travel through time and the news on the map will change to match your interests, and the latest news will always be evident to keep you updated.



Customise the news - Every journalist has his newspaper. Your hub is your personal page, where you can check the news that you have written and monitor their liking, or create your own personalized newspaper. Just a few clicks, and all will be able to see the news you have chosen. Just select the votes, places, people and categories that matter to you. Otherwise, you can add the news individually.



To create your own network you just need to choose your friends and the people you want to follow on your personalized newspaper.

Every journalist has a score, related to the one obtained from all their articles, and a score that changes in response to the feedback they receive. The percentage of reliability decreases if abuse is recorded and increases when the gliders are confirmed or get the highest ratings.



Papglide is smart, because it will always help you to get the news closest to you or follow your interests, thanks to its system of improvement via preferences.

With Papglide we want to create the largest free newspaper in the world: this will be possible thanks to you, our heterogeneous editorial staff, present in every corner of the planet, without any limit of gender, ideology, culture and religion. Papglide will always be free and open to everybody.





But to do so, we need your help. Papglide is currently under construction and your support will allow us to develop and improve the website, so we can make Papglide a reality: we need your help to give a voice to all those people who have something to say and for whom “truth” and “freedom” are more than simple words.

Moreover, we will use the sum raised to create and establish our headquarters, cover the expenses related to servers, commercials and – above all – to offer Papglide freely.

Starting from now, you can join our adventure choosing one of our exclusive perks and give an essential contribution to our project.

Change the world of news: become a journalist, with Papglide.

story:
Short Summary

Welcome to Naked Soul project's page. Greetings, hugs and smile.

I am an artist, writer and poet. I create "art" in the form of dance movements, music, short films and writing. I believe in serendipity. My life's mission is to spread happiness, smile and love. I have traveled to a lot of places and I love telling stories in the form of poetic language. Guess what, here I am, before you, asking for your heartfelt support to help me publish my book "Naked Soul: The Erotic Love Poems".

(watch this video on our YouTube channel with captions as the waterfall was too noisy)

I have been passionate about this project since 2013 when I first thought of self publishing. This extraordinary and powerful collection of erotic and sensual love poems celebrates the erotic spirit in all its forms -- from intense passionate sexual desire to seductive victory.

Moreover, there is too much noise and stress out there in the world. You can relax while slowly reading, reflecting, and visualizing what it would be like to make love with your beloved. This book is full of poems talking about everyday stories that we all can relate to.  Honestly, without your support we cannot finish the editing, design and printing phase of the production. Your support will make a big impact on the heart of thousands of people reading this book.


What We Need & What You Get

The book is ready for editing and design. We need help with cost associated with editing, design, printing and shipping. I am here to tell that we are ready to commit to the fact that we are investing all that we can to make sure that "Naked Soul: The Erotic Love Poems" is published and the various facets of passionate love making is shared with as many like minded souls as possible.

  • Our initial target goal is to raise $25,000 USD for printing the first 4000 copies of the book and shipping them to all those who will buy it now (look at our perks).
  • If we generate more funding, we will print with better quality eco-friendly papers, hire a superior editor and a better print and cover designer to add the best finishing touch to the book. After all, the book is all about celebration of love. Let's create a book that we can proudly showcase to others.

Book's Impact on Society's Heart

"Naked Soul: The Erotic Love Poems" is a beautiful collection of all kinds of human emotions dealing with the theme of love, romance, seduction, chase, erotica, nudity and human fantasies. The poems here cover spiritual love to possessiveness, from hurt to ecstatic joy, from dark passion to sweet seduction, from first love sensations to devastating pain of loss, from conservative and familiar love making to repressed human fantasies. The words here are not just poetic but sublime, touching the heart, gently massaging it with visual imagery, metaphor and emotionally explicit, innocent intimate expressions.

We need more such books today and therefore more support from the masses who still believe in passion, love and the art of storytelling. By making this project come to fruition, trust me, for a night or two, all of us will dance to the muse of our inner longing. I can't wait to hear from all of you who wants to buy this book now.

Teaser Poem for You to Enjoy

If you would like more, please comment and I will put two more here for you to enjoy as you wait for the complete book with over 150 such pieces of fine art that you can relate to. In the book, ideally speaking, I would love to add some pictures & sketches as well. Please, feel free to provide feedback, ask questions, make suggestions or start a conversation in the comment section.

She comes and look deep
into my eyes
Her beautiful majestic eyes
mesmerizing me
There she stand on the doorpost
waiting for my move
I take her hand into my hand
pressing softly

She takes off her clothes gently
to the last piece
There she stand in all skin,
in all her glory
She offers me a rope and
stretches her arm
Her hands tied to the front,
there she waits for me

We warm up and we workout
Sweating, shouting, screaming
Blindfolded like a warrior in the field
Fingers, tongue and soft lips
Our weapons of love
She satisfies me in ways
My words can’t describe
I love her

© Copyright 2014. Salil Jha. All Rights Reserved


Breakdown and Next Steps

As you know, quality products are supported by a whole team of services and experts. Both visibility (marketing) and quality of product is crucial to us at this stage. While it’s easier than ever to get a book to the market, it costs a certain amount of money to do so. We have a beautiful product here, wonderfully written with professional presentation, and we want more and more people to hear about it. We need a book marketer to get "Naked Soul: The Erotic Love Poems" into the bookstores, amazon, et al.

So where does the money go? Where will we spend? In approximation: 

  • Developmental edit – $1000
  • Copyediting – $1500
  • Cover design – $1000
  • Book formatting and layout – $1500
  • Printing – TBD
  • ISBN – $125
  • Author photo – $400
  • Kirkus Review – $425
  • Google Adwords – $1000
  • Facebook Ads – $500
  • Print advertising – $900
  • Marketing consultant/PR – $1500
  • Events/Book signing – $1200
  • Website – $900

Release Dates and Fundraising Goals

  • If we generate our target goal of $25K, we will be publishing the book's first printed edition in October 2014. I am planning to publish it on my birthday on October 8th. If we fall short of the budget, we will be releasing the book right before Valentine's day, Feb 2015. However, I am really hopeful that we can make this book happen by this October. And with your help, yes, we surely can.
  • If you claim your book as eBook or printed copy, it will be mailed to your address before the official release. That's great news, isn't it.
  • If you are going to contribute to us now (but do not buy the book), you would be able to buy it on both amazon.com and lulu.com later. All good news.

Ways You Can Help

  • Please pick a perk that best suits your interest and budget. We have both the soft copy of the book and as well as ebook. And then we also have other steamy perks. Take a look.
  • Please contribute as much as you can. It's not just a book but an expression of human longing. Please support as your heart guides you.
  • Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools to share this project with others on facebook, twitter, instagram, google+,  linkedin, youtube, emails, texts and word of mouth. You can share multiple times.

Finally, I just want to thank you again for your help!

"Naked Soul: The Erotic Love Poems" is a beautiful collection of all kinds of human emotions dealing with the theme of love, romance, seduction, chase, erotica, nudity and human fantasies. The poems here cover spiritual love to possessiveness, from hurt to ecstatic joy, from dark passion to sweet seduction, from first love sensations to devastating pain of loss, from conservative and familiar love making to repressed human fantasies. The words here are not just poetic but sublime, touching the heart, gently massaging it with visual imagery, metaphor and emotionally explicit, innocent intimate expressions.
We need more such books today and therefore more support from the masses who still believe in passion, love and the art of storytelling. By making this project come to fruition, trust me, for a night or two, all of us will dance to the muse of our inner longing. I can't wait to hear from all of you who wants to buy this book now.

Teaser Poem for You to Enjoy
If you would like more, please comment and I will put two more here for you to enjoy as you wait for the complete book with over 150 such pieces of fine art that you can relate to. In the book, ideally speaking, I would love to add some pictures & sketches as well. Please, feel free to provide feedback, ask questions, make suggestions or start a conversation in the comment section.
She comes and look deepinto my eyesHer beautiful majestic eyesmesmerizing meThere she stand on the doorpostwaiting for my moveI take her hand into my handpressing softlyShe takes off her clothes gentlyto the last pieceThere she stand in all skin,in all her gloryShe offers me a rope andstretches her armHer hands tied to the front,there she waits for meWe warm up and we workoutSweating, shouting, screamingBlindfolded like a warrior in the fieldFingers, tongue and soft lipsOur weapons of loveShe satisfies me in waysMy words can’t describeI love her
© Copyright 2014. Salil Jha. All Rights Reserved

   
Breakdown and Next Steps
As you know, quality products are supported by a whole team of services and experts. Both visibility (marketing) and quality of product is crucial to us at this stage. While it’s easier than ever to get a book to the market, it costs a certain amount of money to do so. We have a beautiful product here, wonderfully written with professional presentation, and we want more and more people to hear about it. We need a book marketer to get "Naked Soul: The Erotic Love Poems" into the bookstores, amazon, et al.

So where does the money go? Where will we spend? In approximation: 



Developmental edit – $1000
Copyediting – $1500
Cover design – $1000
Book formatting and layout – $1500
Printing – TBD
ISBN – $125
Author photo – $400
Kirkus Review – $425
Google Adwords – $1000
Facebook Ads – $500
Print advertising – $900
Marketing consultant/PR – $1500
Events/Book signing – $1200
Website – $900

   

Release Dates and Fundraising Goals



If we generate our target goal of $25K, we will be publishing the book's first printed edition in October 2014. I am planning to publish it on my birthday on October 8th. If we fall short of the budget, we will be releasing the book right before Valentine's day, Feb 2015. However, I am really hopeful that we can make this book happen by this October. And with your help, yes, we surely can.


If you claim your book as eBook or printed copy, it will be mailed to your address before the official release. That's great news, isn't it.

If you are going to contribute to us now (but do not buy the book), you would be able to buy it on both amazon.com and lulu.com later. All good news.

Ways You Can Help

Please pick a perk that best suits your interest and budget. We have both the soft copy of the book and as well as ebook. And then we also have other steamy perks. Take a look.
Please contribute as much as you can. It's not just a book but an expression of human longing. Please support as your heart guides you.
Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools to share this project with others on facebook, twitter, instagram, google+,  linkedin, youtube, emails, texts and word of mouth. You can share multiple times.


Finally, I just want to thank you again for your help!

story:
The founder of the black tax served in the United States Navy during two major wars. Leo Moor is a graduate of Columbia College, Missouri. While serving on board the USS Klakring a young Leo was confronted with the system of Racism, White Supremacy for the first time. Since that time Mr. Moor has dedicated his life to replacing the system of Racism, White Supremacy with a system of justice for all.  Leo Moor has been a proud member of the Prince Hall Masonic body since 2005. Mr. Moor is a member of the AEAONMS PHA. While doing charity work it was discovered that this was sweeping leaves on a windy day. The black community needs charity but more importantly we need to govern ourselves. We need to have resources for the future generations to survive. We need our real history in schools that we control and jobs for our children.     

Race: The Elephant in the Room Will Kill You is the first release from from Leo Bashir Moor. The book is the most detailed decoding of racism, white supremacy today. This book is also very important because every single book touched will lead to a donation to The Black Tax. The Black Tax will create capital for African American owned businesses. You will have a full understanding of racism, white supremacy and a road map to deal with it after reading this book. The book is broken down for all people, young and older people can understand the code of white supremacy. Leo Bashir Moor delivers an unapologetic read that will change your understanding of white supremacy. Unless you are living under a rock you have witnessed a surge in white supremacy since The Jena 6 and the election of the first African American President. The question is are you willing to go without a fight or are you ready to build?

story:
Hi there, I am here to share the news of my first poetry book "DYING" and ask you to kindly help this little book get some funds for publishing and distribution.

"DYING" collects some of my best works in the past 10 years after my moving to the USA permanently in 2010. There are merely 44* Chinese poems and 6 English ones (my English name for writing poetry is Zhou Doubt as seen on the book cover) in the book, but it weighs as all poems reflect on life-death, reminiscing-aging, and subjects surrounding them. They are echoes of my life journey into late autumn and in my belief every other being's similar experience. The other half of the book is blank pages for readers to scribble their own thoughts on.

I am also a film writer/director and the founder of Memory Community, a non-profit aimed for filming older adults' life stories. I, going by DeYoung Zhou, launched a fundraiser here and successfully completed it. This is the second time I am here presenting my different fundraising project.

I would like to reach my goal at $500 (the minimum sum Indiegogo requires and the total sum of the poems in the book is 50, so it can be considered only $10 for each poem.) I will spend about half of the funds to pay back my unusual friend who pre-paid for the total publishing fee (Taiwan dollar) of the book which was a little less than $150. Another $150 will be used to buy back as many copies as needed for publicity and gratitude, including your rewards. The remaining funds will be used for shipping your rewards and for other necessities (e.g. Indiegogo's platform fee.) If I do not reach my entire goal, I will still go as mentioned above accordingly.

*In Mandarin, the pronunciation of "4" (si in the 4th tone) is similar to the pronunciation of "death" (si in the 3rd tone), so 4 is a number often associated with death in the Chinese culture.

story:
Short Summary

My book (that I worked on for 5 years!) shows people the overall pattern of Humanity's move from the Mind to the Heart and from Power to Love, and what this means for you and all humankind.


My Book Description

""No problem can be solved from the same level of consciousness that created it." -A.E.

The world has reached the limit of the rational mind's ability to solve, and so we are moving beyond the mind. 

Impacting everyone on the planet, the move from Mind to Heart is a larger change than when we adopted fire, a faster change than the industrial era, and has more power to transform absolutely everything than the telephone, computers and all prior technology combined.

Humanity’s move is both vast and deeply personal. With a firm grasp on the big picture and all of the pieces, Kirstin delicately outlines how these seismic changes are causing many to move in ways unfamiliar to them, and she offers reassurance that these changes are ultimately powerfully positive and healing, and ways to identify and navigate thru common experiences, including how to work with your heart in new ways.

With clarity and a gentle approach, Kirstin speaks to the changing shape of what we are now going thru as humanity moves from the Mind to Heart. In plain English, and pointing to real-world events and happenings at every layer and level of humanity, Kirstin communicates in such a way that your mind can begin to understand where our hearts are now going—as we move from the rule of mind to the sovereignty of the heart—and into extraordinary new frontiers of human experience."" 

Look Inside
  1. The overall pattern of what's going on with humanity right now.  VERY CLEARLY. The map of humanity's move from the mind to the heart, so your mind can see, relax and trust  -  you can see and know what's going on. It's very simple once you see it. 
  2. What is behind all the intensification right now. Humanity's one obstacle and how we each move beyond it. 
  3.  I teach you how to work with your heart to dissolve out old gunk and open to more love and power. 
  4. Stories of the beautiful world we are coming into, and  stories of the magic of your higher nature: which is what opens thru your heart in the new energies, as you become more and more YOU. (Unicorn means "awakened one" by the way, all you unicorns.)


Why I Wrote This Book

    • After experiencing “success” and then near-death burnout in the hyperdrive of Silicon Valley tech culture, I was told I might die if I didn’t take a break. My life was a wreck, so I started looking at what was really going on in the big picture. 
    • I worked with outliers – from deep physics to energy healers, co-working Hubs and tech organizations, wall street to indigenous wisdom teachers. I learned from the various edges…about the middle…where everything connects to everything. 
    • I began to see that I was not alone - a lot was changing. 
    • I began speaking to people and I found that what I had learned was hugely valuable to others. More and more people came to me.
    • There were more people than I could speak to and so I wrote this book.
    • I believe this books hits the moment of now and can bring clarity, help inspire, empower, and en-joy (create more enjoyment for) so many. 
    • The way I see is rare.
    • More of my story. 

What I Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • I'm asking for at least $3450 in pre-orders, support and help, and perks to move me thru this final period. I have been working on this for a long time, and I've committed everything. 
  • I have some very fun and clear heart-power-empowering and videos that will go along with the book's themes. Also, I always come up with more stuff along the way, so even if you contribute $1,  you'll know what's moving along! I always come up with new stuff along the way. 
  • If I don't reach my funding  goal, everyone who supports this book at the book level will receive it no matter what.


The Impact

  • There are just a lot of people wondering what the heck is going on right now on the planet. 
  • I have very important knowledge for this time. 
  • Many people know something is up, but their mind can't articulate what's going on yet. 
  • My book shares the clear and simple map of these times: the end of power, the decline of violence, the rise of love, what's behind the intensification right now and what's BEYOND it and how we get there. 
  • So your mind can relax and trust where our hearts are going. And you can experience more safety, happiness and peace. 
  • And if you're in your mind, I teach you how to move to your heart. 
    • This is a major issue as some are trapped in their minds and do not know how to walk from Mind to Heart and are not feeling the new love energies on the planet.
  • My book opens up more love and peace and joy - and truly helps people know what's going on, how to navigate in and benefit from these times - things are incredibly different right now. 
  • My book teaches people to see the overall pattern on the planet right now so your mind can relax and trust your heart as you work with it, 
  • My book contributes to an exponential healing and empowerment wave on the planet.


Risks & Challenges

  • Challenge: This is the most valuable thing I have to offer the world now. So, it's important, intimate and takes courage. My heart is out there. And my massive knowledge base. 
  • Challenges: I'm so desiring being completely supported as I walk this home! There are more images and design support I'd like that I don't presently have funds for. 
  • And to know people are looking forward to experiencing my work, and to have the support to easily and fret-free complete this because I know my baseline is all-covered would be a huge gift.
  • This book is happening no matter what. I'd love to be fully met this last bit home. 


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Can you please help spread the word? Use the IndieGoGo Share tools!
  • Hire me for a project  in January after I catch my breath? goo.gl/y0SDkF
  • Are you my tribe? Let me know if you are!

story:
I've always wanted to write my own kind of fairy tale, one where the main protagonist was feisty, determined, and relatable. I also wanted to explore the rich Inca culture and its interesting mythology. Kutu, the tiny Inca Princess is a project that has allowed me to do all that, and now I'm ready to share it with the world!

I'm Mariana Llanos, a Peruvian born writer who lives in Oklahoma. I've published eight children's books. This is Kutu's second Indiegogo campaign. With your help I will be able to meet my goal:

  • $1000 to aid with printing costs. Please know that this is only part of the costs associated with the book!
  • If we exceed the goal, I will use it to translate this book completely into quechua.
  • Furthermore, may be a dream, but I would like to bring a copy of this book to each child in a school in Cusco (school not selected yet)
  • By selecting The Fan Option you will be basically pre-ordering your copy of the book. You can pitch in with any amount as many times as you would like.

  •  I'm back from a long vacation to my home country of Peru where I visited Kutu's own "hometown": Cusco. I had an splendid time there, learning more about history and just breathing in all the magic of that beautiful city.

    Kutu's first Indiegogo campaign is closed now. It didn't go as well as I had expected, but I'm not going to let that discourage me from meeting my goals with this book. A combination of personal turmoil and bad timing got the best of me this year. As a result, I will have to take a change of course and see less expensive ways to publish this book. Don't worry, though. This doesn't mean my commitment with my backers is going to be impacted. I'll still fulfill your orders and hopefully, meet your expectations.

    When I posted an update on Facebook last week, a person criticized our choice of style for the character of Kutu. "Why do you have to present her as being short and chubby?" Furthermore, she said, "She should be normal. We need to break the bad stereotypes..." 

    So my answer to her was NOT ALL PRINCESSES HAVE TO BE LEAN AND TALL! And since when being short and/or chubby is considered subnormal? 

    This commentator, in my opinion, suffers from reverse prejudice. According to her thinking, we need to "normalize" everyone by making our differences invisible.

    The way I see it, Kutu represents those who aren't lean or tall but are equally strong and brave. She learns to be comfortable in her own skin and discovers her inner strength. Isn't that a message we all want passed onto our sons and daughters?

  • Thanks for your support, please keep on sharing this campaign.

story:
About Us

We are Richir Outreach. We are a small, tech organizing firm based out of Raleigh, NC. Our mission is to use the tools technology presents us with, to build stronger organizations and campaigns to advance social good. We work mostly with small non-profit and advocacy groups, and we love the opportunity that gives us to work to improve our community. Among various other tech solutions, one of our most common roles is that we are certified NationBuilder developers. 

The NationBuilder Field Guide

With our project the NationBuilder Field Guide we are hoping to compile the exhaustive body of information out there, and contribute our years of expertise to a handy manual that will help organizations and people get started on the popular CRM/CMS platform NationBuilder. It's our hope that this manual will serve as the definitive "getting started" guide to NationBuilder for organizations everywhere. This guide, will offer small organizations a chance to maximize their use of the default functions of the NationBuilder platform, even if they have no budget for web development. It will also serve as a powerful training tool for organizers with-in an organization - to make the process of training new staff on how to use NationBuilder easier.

We're certified NationBuilder Architects, and we've learned a few things in our years working with the software. Now we would like the opportunity to share that knowledge with everyone, regardless of their budget.

What is NationBuilder?

NationBuilder is a powerful CMS and CRM platform that combines key features of online presence and organization, to make managing a website easy for a non-profit, a political campaign, or even a small business.
For more info see this short intro taken from the guide itself: http://guide.nationbuilder.com/what_is_nationbuilder

What We Need & What You Get

To help make this guide a reality, we're turning to you. It's our goal to rise $3000 towards this project - so that we can cover the cost of writing, editing, and publishing the manual. We want to know that what we're doing will be useful to people, and your donation ensures that support.

Our perks are pretty simple, and of course - everyone who donates gets a copy of the guide in some format. In addition to that, there are plenty of extra features and access for our top contributors.

If we don't meet our goal to fund the full publishing process of the guide, we will still give all of our donors an electronic copy of the guide.

Risks & Challenges

We're dedicated to making this guide a reality, but we are currently stifled by publishing costs, as well as the cost of resources to pull the guide together. We have a great start using our organization's internal documentation but we need some help to make it a finished product.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this with other organizers and activists that you know. We're pursuing this because we see a need in the NationBuilder community for a guide like this - but we could really use your help spreading the word.

Be sure to follow us on Twitter, and Facebook:

  • https://twitter.com/NBFieldGuide
  • https://www.facebook.com/RichirOutreach

To help make this guide a reality, we're turning to you. It's our goal to rise $3000 towards this project - so that we can cover the cost of writing, editing, and publishing the manual. We want to know that what we're doing will be useful to people, and your donation ensures that support.
Our perks are pretty simple, and of course - everyone who donates gets a copy of the guide in some format. In addition to that, there are plenty of extra features and access for our top contributors.
If we don't meet our goal to fund the full publishing process of the guide, we will still give all of our donors an electronic copy of the guide.
Risks & Challenges

We're dedicated to making this guide a reality, but we are currently stifled by publishing costs, as well as the cost of resources to pull the guide together. We have a great start using our organization's internal documentation but we need some help to make it a finished product.
Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this with other organizers and activists that you know. We're pursuing this because we see a need in the NationBuilder community for a guide like this - but we could really use your help spreading the word.
Be sure to follow us on Twitter, and Facebook:

https://twitter.com/NBFieldGuide
https://www.facebook.com/RichirOutreach

story:
My name is Alouy Martinez, I'm a current student at Sul Ross State University where I'm majoring in Creative Writing with a minor in Art. I've  published two short stories with the University's Literary Magazine known as the Sage, "Red Lights"(2013) and a poem "Scarlet "(2014). I've also self-published the series that I'm here to talk to you about. I'm an artist, and I recently won an award for a self-portrait at an Art competition within the University. (3rd place) 

The purpose of raising this money is to re-lunch a series that I can't let go. I strongly believe The Shadows Saga has potential, and will teach valuable lessons that today are mostly masked by too much romance and graphic scenes of today's books, and while The Shadows Saga does contain this elements. It mostly focuses on family and friendship, and the struggles of human/immortal nature. The series at the moment is consider Young Adult (YA), yet, with this re-launch the series will turn into New Adult (NA) meaning it will have more mature scenes that were omitted before.

I know I'm asking for a lot, but I'm re-lunching a series; meaning not just one book, but two short stories and the second book in the series. Your help will help me achieve something that I was too naive to understand the magnitude of marketing a book. For me, it was and still is all about the story, but in reality to continue writing and expose my stories to the public, money has to be invest with: editing, great cover, content, marketing distribution, and clarity. With your help I can achieve these and more.

Summery of prequel short story White Raven (Book 0.5)

White Raven is a very short story set within the world of The Shadows Saga, following Ophelia an Akita soldier who is sworn to protect the Shadows. The story takes place moments before the Shadows return in the first book The Shadows: The Return Has Begun.

Summery of The Shadows: The Return Has Begun (Book 1)

Destiny is about to change. What lurks in the shadows may change the destiny of six young lives forever. That is, if they can survive at all. The Shadows: The Return Has Begun, the heart-pounding young adult debut novel by Alouy Martinez, is a tale of mystery, suspense, action, and romance that charts the perilous course of six young characters as their fates unfold, and their true identities are revealed as the formidable entities known as The Shadows. Dramatic, dark, and alluring, this enthralling work of fiction goes where no vampire or werewolf novel has ever gone before. The Shadows: The Return Has Begun shares the points of view of the six young characters as they journey together to Paris, France. They are Ashlenn Vandenhoff, Melinda Wadsworth, Darcy Roswell, Christopher De Groot, Kaden Worthington, and Justin Fraser. In Paris, each must grapple with his or her own inner demons. However, it soon becomes chillingly evident that someone is in bloodthirsty pursuit of them all. They soon thereafter realize their destiny as The Shadows, beings created over two thousand years ago to restore order to the unbroken rules of The Heavenly Laws. Upon their demise in 486 AD, a prophecy was born as they took their lives into their own hands. That prophecy marked their return. However this time, destiny won’t control them. At the onset of the novel, Ashlenn is having visions of her parents’ death, but she chooses to ignore them. As the novel shifts perspective from one character to the next, plots diverge, then intertwine again. Similarly, each of the characters in The Shadows brings into light his or her most hidden moments, only to face a destiny that may be even more terrifying yet. Will they overcome forces that are primed to wage deadly battle against them all? And can they face their own demons as they do? The Shadows: The Return Has Begun creates a new legion of deadly foes that rages through every gripping page of this wildly inventive, gripping new novel.

Summery of short novella Whisper to me Softly (Book 1.5)

There’s only two things that Nathalie Thorn cares about, surviving and fulfilling her promise. When her father was murdered, Nathalie made a promise to never return to sea, until she finds her father’s killer. Little did she know that her promise would become her curse.
FROM THE WORLD OF THE SHADOWS SAGA
Learn the story behind Nathalie Thorn, and unravel the truth behind her Immortality.

What We Need & What You Get

First of all most of the money will go into buying and shipping all the goodies you that you are getting. With that said, everything will be shipped once I either reach me goal, or come in contact with the money.

Second, as mention before, the current books and the 2nd book in the series will get rounds of editing, proofreading and copy editing, which believe it or not, its the most expensive process of self-publishing. With my first publication, I payed over $5,000 dollars and $3,000 of that money (rounding number here) went into editing itself, and while it was great editing, it still needed it another round, and I didn't had the money to do that. I went forward with the publication, because I was not going to waste my money by keeping the book just for me. There are not many mistakes, but I've come across reviews that mention the mistakes, and for a writer we want the best quality of our story. Also, I keep coming across that the book seems to throw people off due to the amount of details and world building, with editing and proofreading it will help clarify the story better. Also wink, wink adding the scenes that will make the series from Young Adult to New Adult.

Third, the series is actually illustrated by me. Each chapter contains a drawing at the beginning of an important scene within the chapter, thus, foreshadowing a little bit what the chapter will be about. Again, I was rushing things too fast when I drew them, because this was actually a last minute idea that I added when publishing the series, and I kinda got stuck with the style of the drawings. Therefore, with the re-launch I will re-due these drawings, but in the style of digital art. Yet, I need the tools to create this new art, and with your help I will be buying an Wacom Cintiq 13HD in order achieve the new quality of the illustrations, plus re-due the covers of each book with illustrations that will represent the books better, and appeal to readers more. (Side Note: The Cintiq 13HD will also come with great perks for my college studies and future works)

Fourth, as said before, exposure is important when it comes to the publishing world. With your help, I will be setting off marketing tools such as paying to get a reviews with Publishers Weekly or other outlets of exposure: such as Facebook, Goodreads Advertisements,  book bloggers for reviews, and blog tours. I wish I could go on a book tour, but that will cost a lot more, and that's something that with the success of this re-lunch can hopefully be achieve in the future. 

Now let's get to the fun part, the goodies you will get for helping the Shadows return once more.

IMPORTANT NOTE: ONCE THE CAMPAIGN IS OVER, I WILL BE CONTACTING ALL THE CONTRIBUTORS FOR SHIPPING ADDRESSES, E-MAILS, SHIRT SIZES IF THEY APPLY. I WILL BE ASKING FOR A SCREEN SHOT OR PROOF OF YOUR DONATION. I'M STILL FIGURING OUT HOW ALL THESE WORKS. ALSO THERE WILL AN E-MAIL SOON SET UP TO CONTACT ALL OF YOU. 

  • $5 THE eBOOK READER-

    You will get the digital downloads of the first three eBooks with the new covers and illustrations. The eBooks are in order: Whiter Raven (A short prequel story) The Shadows: The Return Has Begun (Book 1) Whisper to me Softly (A short Novella) NOTE: The titles may change due to the re-launch, and you will get the 2nd editions NOT THE CURRENT ONES once they come out. I will also be sending you e-mails, providing you with updates about the changes and covers, and all that good stuff.  (PROVIDE YOUR E-MAIL ADDRESS)
  • $10 THE LOYAL READER -

    You will get the first 3 eBooks as  digital downloads  with the new covers and illustrations. The eBooks are in order: Whiter Raven (A short prequel story) The Shadows: The Return Has Begun (Book 1) Whisper to me Softly (A short Novella)  NOTE: The titles may change due to the re-launch. PLUS you will also get: A Pin of the Shadows emblem and three prints of my art (6" x 4 " inches) or if you will like to wait for the illustrations of the book, you can choose a print from them, but you will have to wait till all the illustrations are done. (PROVIDE YOUR E-MAIL AND SHIPPING ADDRESS. IF YOU ARE OUTSIDE THE U.S. ADD $10 BUCKS FOR SHIPPING INTERNATIONAL)
  • $25 MAKE ME IMMORTAL -

    ou will get the same goodies as The Loyal Reader package PLUS the new edition of the paperback version of The Shadows: The Return Has Begun Book 1 (Note: Title may change).. (PROVIDE YOUR E-MAIL AND SHIPPING ADDRESS. IF YOU ARE OUTSIDE THE U.S. PLEASE ADD $25 BUCKS FOR SHIPPING INTERNATIONAL.)
  • $30 T-Shirt ONLY - With a quote from the book  - 

    I tried to fit the t-shirt in the packages, but they are too expensive, especially with the colors, so this one will only get you the t-shirt with a quote from book 1 that says "Because within every light soul lies darkness."  You chose male or female shirt. (PROVIDE YOUR E-MAIL AND SHIPPING ADDRESS AS WELL AS YOUR SIZE OF SHIRT U.S. SIZES. ALSO IF YOU ARE OUTSIDE THE U.S. PLEASE ADD $25 bucks for SHIPPING INTERNATIONAL.)
  • $30 T-shirt only - With a Design of my artwork -

    I tried to fit the t-shirt in the packages, but they are too expensive, especially with the colors, so this one will only get you the t-shirt design of my art of a cross and triangle.  You chose male or female shirt. (PROVIDE YOUR E-MAIL AND SHIPPING ADDRESS AS WELL AS YOUR SIZE OF SHIRT U.S. SIZES. ALSO IF YOU ARE OUTSIDE THE U.S. PLEASE ADD $25 bucks for SHIPPING INTERNATIONAL.)
  • $40 The Book Worm -

    Will get you all the goodies above,  plus a Tote Bag and a Key Chain (except the T-Shirt/s)(PROVIDE YOUR E-MAIL AND SHIPPING ADDRESS. IF YOU ARE OUTSIDE THE U.S. PLEASE ADD $25 bucks for SHIPPING INTERNATIONAL.)
  • $45 COSMETIC BAG -

    Melinda one of the characters in the Shadows Saga is a total diva, and is always prepare to look good, now you can too, with this cosmetic bag design by me. I think Melinda would approve of your choice. This only gets you the Cosmetic Bag (PROVIDE YOUR E-MAIL AND SHIPPING ADDRESS. IF YOU ARE OUTSIDE THE U.S. PLEASE ADD $25 bucks for SHIPPING INTERNATIONAL.)
  • $50 THE FANATIC -

    Will get you all the goodies above, (except the T-shirt and Cosmetic Bag) plus a 16 X 12 inches poster. (PROVIDE YOUR E-MAIL AND SHIPPING ADDRESS . IF YOU ARE OUTSIDE THE U.S. PLEASE ADD $25 bucks for SHIPPING INTERNATIONAL.)
  • $75 THE IMMORTAL -

    Will get you all the goodies above, (Except the T-shirt and Cosmetic Bag) plus the 2nd book The Shadows: And the Daughters of the Dead in paperback. (Note: Title may change)(PROVIDE YOUR E-MAIL AND SHIPPING ADDRESS. IF YOU ARE OUTSIDE THE U.S. PLEASE ADD $25 bucks for SHIPPING INTERNATIONAL.)
  • $100 A CONCLAVE MEMBER - ONLY 2 Available -

    Will get you all the goodies above (except the T-shirt and Cosmetic Bag) PLUS the first edition of The Shadows: The Return Has Begun in paperback, marked with notes of how I crafted the story, and what changes from the first edition to the second edition. Plus who knows maybe some little secrets only 2 of you will get to know. (PROVIDE YOUR E-MAIL AND SHIPPING ADDRESS. IF YOU ARE OUTSIDE THE U.S. PLEASE ADD $25 bucks for SHIPPING INTERNATIONAL.)
  • $300 ANGEL OF DEATH - ONLY 10 Available 

    You will get all the goodies above (Except the T-shirt, the First edition of the first book with notes from the package A CONCLAVE MEMBER and the Cosmetic Bag) with this package you will get a 18 X 24 painting of you or anything you want me to paint. Note you must have the copyrights to whatever image you want me to paint, or if you want me to create you an original work let me know. We will discuss your options with e-mail.) NOTE: Painting takes a while, about a week each painting and I'm doing 10 of this plus 2 more that are larger. They also take some time to dry, so give me at least 2 to 3 weeks to get it done depending on the order you donated for this package. I'm sure most of you will understand, plus I will keep you updated on the painting process. :) Also here's a self-portrait of me to show you my painting skills. (PROVIDE YOUR E-MAIL AND SHIPPING ADDRESS. IF YOU ARE OUTSIDE THE U.S. PLEASE ADD $25 bucks for SHIPPING INTERNATIONAL.)
  • $700 WELCOME TO THE SHADOW'S WORLD- ONLY 2 GENDER BASED ONE MALE / ONE FEMALE -

    Will get you all the goodies above (Except the T-shirt, First edition copy with notes, and the 18 x 24 paintings) With this one you will get the same deal as the Angel of Death, except you get a 30 X 40 painting and.... Drum rolls please.... a character name after you. We both will work together to include personality traits that define you; dislikes, likes, favorite food anything you name it. Once I got a profile of you, I will base the character personalty as best as I can to you. Also, you will get to choose if you want to be a Witch, Vampire, Werewolf, or a Nightshade. I will update once each gender is taken, but hey, if you want to be a character of the opposite sex, go for it, is your character before it becomes part of the Shadows' World.             
  • NOTE FOR THE PAINTINGS: Painting takes a while, about a week each painting and I'm doing 10 of this plus 2 more that are larger. They also take some time to dry, so give me at least 2 to 3 weeks to get it done depending on the order you donated for this package. I'm sure most of you will understand, plus I will keep you updated on the painting process. :) Also here's a self-portrait of me to show you my painting skills. (PROVIDE YOUR E-MAIL AND SHIPPING ADDRESS. IF YOU ARE OUTSIDE THE U.S. PLEASE ADD $25 bucks for SHIPPING INTERNATIONAL.)
    IF ANYTHING ELSE COMES UP I WILL LET YOU GUYS KNOW RIGHT AWAY!!! ALSO KNOW THAT EVERYTHING THAT CAN BE SIGN, WILL BE SIGN BY ME IF YOU WANT ME TO.

    The Impact

    I don't want to keep you from reading more, so I will simply keep it short, and let you know that your help will impact my writing a lot. The Shadows are characters that are really important to me, every night I go to sleep imagining the impact that could give to other people out there. To me the story is what matters, and with your help, I can get the Shadows to many readers out there.

    One thing is for sure, once my characters are out there, they don't only became part of my world, they become yours. Thank you so much from the bottom of my heart for reading this long post. I hope you all love the goodies.

    Risks & Challenges

    As I mention, editing is my biggest challenge, my first language was Spanish so part of my lack of skills are due to that. Each day I'm learning and preparing myself more, but with a great editor I can make my stories shine more.

    Getting the word out there about the Shadows Saga plays a big part, hopefully with your help we can reach many audiences across the world.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Don't have money, but you want to become part of the Shadows Saga world, don't worry. Spreading the word about this IndieGoGo campaign can be a great help. Tweeting about it with the hash-tag  #TheShadowsSaga and #IndieGoGo will get you a shout out from me on Twitter. Liking The Shadows Saga page on facebook and sharing all the goodies there, is also a great help. http://www.facebook.com/TheShadowsSaga or following me on Twitter @AlouyMartinez to keep in touch with all my craziness, art, and Writing.

      ALSO NOTE: The current editions of the books as well as the first edition of The Shadows: The Return Has Begun in Paperback will remain available until the new editions hit the market. White Raven the eBook prequel  is actually free on iTunes and Smashwords at the moment. Sorry Amazon is difficult to keep it free. If you want to consider them as advance copies or whatever go for it. Once more thank you!

Once I got a profile of you, I will base the character personalty as best as I can to you. Also, you will get to choose if you want to be a Witch, Vampire, Werewolf, or a Nightshade. I will update once each gender is taken, but hey, if you want to be a character of the opposite sex, go for it, is your character before it becomes part of the Shadows' World.

10 of this plus 2 more that are larger. They also take some time to dry,
 so give me at least 2 to 3 weeks to get it done depending on the order 
you donated for this package. I'm sure most of you will understand, plus
 I will keep you updated on the painting process. :) Also here's a 
self-portrait of me to show you my painting skills. (PROVIDE YOUR E-MAIL AND SHIPPING ADDRESS. IF YOU ARE OUTSIDE THE U.S. PLEASE ADD $25 bucks for 
SHIPPING INTERNATIONAL.)

The Shadows are characters that are really important to me, every night I go to sleep imagining the impact that could give to other people out there. To me the story is what matters, and with your help, I can get the Shadows to many readers out there.One thing is for sure, once my characters are out there, they don't only became part of my world, they become yours. story:
Lindsay Sandiford

is a 58 year old British Citizen who was sentenced to death by firing squad in January 2012 in Bali, Indonesia.  Lindsay has never had adequate legal representation and now needs funds to be able to instruct an Indonesian speaking capital lawyer to prepare her final appeal and, should that fail, a plea for clemency to the President of Indonesia. 

The UK Government has been asked to help with funding for legal representation and has flatly refused to do so.  We are left with no alternative but to try to raise the funds privately.

We are vehemently opposed to the death penalty worldwide.

story:
My name is Damon Ferrell Marbut. 

I'm an independent author finding myself on an accidental campaign to read and talk across the country. As a Pulitzer Prize entrant for Fiction, I am now trying to follow through on the requests I've received from Austin, Seattle, San Francisco and Denver, to stand in likely dim light and talk about this book.

This campaign I'm asking you to join is much larger than myself. I've largely bowed behind my work. What your contribution means, in this case, is freedom for me to accept all of these offers across this country, to talk about in public what I have only been considering in my own small world until now.

What you offer sends me out in to this.

This is what my financial goal accomplishes:

Hotel rooms, gas, food, airfare and promotional materials such as posters and flyers not provided by the venues. I'll likely need more business cards printed as well. And books I have to send these bookstores on consignment so that they might make a profit on having me there to read. This usually means crates of them I must pay for ahead of time. Per venue for this tour, the book cost alone will be around 200.00-250.00, for a total of at least 1000.00 as of right now.

What you give makes me as a national author more concrete, because I'll have the chance to meet people in person rather than online. The human connection your donation affords me is priceless. 

And lastly, if this does not seem reasonable in terms of your financial involvement, please know that your social media connection is valued as well. Any link you might provide to my work is valued and needed.

story:
“Searching for Paco Chang“, is the third adventure novel in Scott Amours "Dreamer Trilogy".

Jack Irvine once again teams up with Ambrose Dvorjack to help his best friend and ex-lover Sylvie bring down a child porn and human trafficking cartel run by the notorious Paco Chang. Jacks obsession  with a young free spirited girl that he befriends at an AA meeting keeps getting in the way, almost costing him his life and that of Dvorjack.
 
What is this campaign about? Our friend Scott Amour, was a gifted writer who had a way of turning human rights issues into exciting adventure dramas, based on real life. Those of you who have known Scott know how important it is to have his third novel published and complete his legacy. For those of you who don't, the human rights issues are important enough to make a difference.

For the past ten years Lunaventure has been working hard to turn Scott's three novels into feature films.  Dreamer, received a most favorable review by the “New York Times” and East of Java about the invasion and massacre of East Timor, is being read by many film making professionals and has been read, reviesed and endorsed by the President and Prime Minister of East Timor. 

THE ISSUE: Woman and Children are trafficked in their thousands. They are coerced and sold as sex workers, labourers, and for other types of exploitive work, a gross violation of human rights. 

Where will the Money go?

Goal number ONE : to see the successful publishing of Scott Amour's third manuscript "Searching for Paco Chang" and thus completeing the trilogy of his work into a franchise of novels and feature films.

Goal number TWO: To use the remaining funds, for preproduction, getting the project off the ground, and using the momentum to generate buzz and additional funding.

story:
When you donate, make sure you click the perk you want!

What's this story about?

This is a story of Atlantis. How it came to be, how it was at its peak, and how it sank. And what the people decided to do about it. 


Princess Nicky is one of my three main characters. She's fourteen years old, average height for her age. She is fun, adventurous, and enjoys the little things in life. 

                                    

But she is flawed, like everybody else. She is afraid of responsibility and is often caught playing when she should be working. In the picture above she's playing a game that I invented called Quibthrow. There are two teams. The goal of the blue team is to get the disk into the basket. The goal of the red team is to get the disk away from the blue team. The twist is that if you're holding the disk, you have to close your eyes.


Her best friend since forever is Philo (pronounced "Fee-low"). He's fifteen years old, has rich brown hair, and is a bit short for his age. He's a little more cautious when it comes to adventure and danger, since those two often go hand in hand. His caution may have something to do with his uncanny ability to sense danger.

                                    

In the picture above, a sorcerer is attempting to kidnap Nicky,creating a windstorm around them to keep them contained. This is one of my favorite scenes :) It was a lot of fun to write. Can you see the raven?


My third main character is Fidus ("Fi-duhs"). He's nineteen years old, tall, pale, has dark hair, and usually wears a frown. He's very loyal to his king and thrives when challenged.  He's smart and creative. He's a sorcerer's apprentice who has mastered the manipulation of light and is working on mastering water. The problem is, his master is working against the king. I don't have any illustrations of him yet... that's part of what the money is going towards.


About me!

Hi! I'm Katelyn, sixteen years old, and home schooled since first grade. My favorite thing to do in the whole wide world is to create, whether it's writing, drawing, building, or brainstorming about new story ideas.


I had the idea for the story when I was twelve. The first scene that popped into my head was the ending. I'm not going to spoil it so I'm not telling you what that scene is. :)


I actually started writing the book when I was thirteen, but with no thought of publishing it. I just wanted to get my idea down on paper, and it was on paper, so I wouldn't lose it. Well, I lost my little paper book so I had to make a new one. After I lost that one as well (by now I'm fourteen) I decided to write it on the computer. I had written a few chapters when my Dad, who helped me whenever I asked and is my number one supporter, asked, "How about you try to publish this?" And here I am :) This is the longest project I've ever worked on and I'm beyond happy to see this finally coming to a close, 65,000+ words later. 


Where the money is going to go...

Eventually I plan to do my own illustrations, but as of this moment I lack the ability. That's why I need the money for three more illustrations from my talented artist, the cover art, as well as the first printing of books and a small website. 


If I don't reach my goal amount, I will just have to not do the additional illustrations, perhaps skip the website, and maybe skimp on some of the other things.  But I really think the additional illustrations would make the book better and, of course, the website would help everyone spread the word!  So please consider helping me launch this project the right way! Thanks so much!

story:
More than 100,000 people are estimated to have died already in the Syrian Civil War with no end in sight.

Myriad outsiders have become involved with foreign fighters from around the world, including from the United States and Europe. More recently, President Obama threatened to go to war with Syria.

US Patriot Missiles at Gazianthep, Turkey. (US Army photo.)

Estimates of refugees vary from 2.5 million to 9 million.  Many have fled to Turkey, Lebanon, Iraq, Jordan, Africa, and to Europe.

Though I publicly opposed US military intervention for various reasons, the refugee issue cannot be ignored forever.

Possibility of wider war is palpable.  (US Army photo, Gazianthep.)

People are suffering immensely and the floodgates are open.  There are reports of unaccompanied children among the refugees.  What became of their parents is known only to the children, if they know.

Huge numbers of refugees are living in tents.  With winter fast approaching, life will soon go from terrible to worse.

US Air Force loads supplies for Syrian refugees. (USAF photo.)

The humanitarian crisis leads directly to political crisis, and the growing possibility of broadened war that can include US allies such as Turkey.  Israel has been bombing targets in Syria.  Saudi Arabia and others are involved in military aid, adding fuel to the inferno.

Iran and Russia are deeply involved.

The UN requested a stunning $5.1 billion for Syria aid.  This growing crisis is of massive significance.  Be assured that if this continues unabated, the United States and Europe will be neck deep in mud that makes Afghanistan look like a training exercise.

Other countries such as Lebanon are being destabilized.  If they fall into war, this can go like a fission reaction: more refugees create more instability, which creates more refugees.  Already there are more refugees than interested nations are prepared to handle.

US Air Force bringing aid to Syrian Refugees.  (USAF photo.)

My contacts say there are important aspects being ignored by the mainstream.  Please recall that in 2006, I was far ahead of the MSM pack with the reality of the direction of the Afghanistan war.

On the ground information and analysis is crucial. But there is little of that from any corner.

“Think-tanking” from Washington is problematic at best.

Recently, one of the most influential think-tanks, the Institute for the Study of War (ISW), was leading the charge for Syrian intervention, using a lady named "Dr." Elizabeth O’Bagy as their Syria expert.

Dr. O’Bagy was lauded and cited by Secretary of State John Kerry and Senator John McCain as a Syria expert whose opinion was of grave importance.  ISW had been at the center of much of our war planning in Iraq and Afghanistan and I would see the principals in high level places on a frequent basis.  We often sat in the same rooms with the same generals.

With Dr. O’Bagy on the ISW staff, and with her PhD from Georgetown, and her known Syria expertise, O’Bagy had a voice that people wanted to hear.

Dr. O’Bagy’s expert advice was being heard by millions of people on major networks and in major papers.  Everybody “in the know” realizes that ISW work reaches successive Presidents.  The influence of ISW cannot be understated.  Dr. O’Bagy and ISW were helping to march us to war.

But there was a problem: Dr. Elizabeth O’Bagy had no PhD.

O’Bagy was not a Syria expert.

British Royal Air Force “Reaper” drone over Afghanistan: four Hellfire missiles and two 500lb smart bombs.  (Photo Michael Yon.)

Dr. O’Bagy is a fraud.  She made it up whole cloth.

ISW and the highest levels of the US Government lapped it up.  I cancelled my subscription to ISW analysis.  A piece of their influence vanished.  Senator McCain then hired O’Bagy.

War and millions of people are at stake.  We are being deceived again.  We need truth.

I will fly to Turkey in 12 hours for an investigative journey to spend time with Syrians who recently were inside, and to ask locals what the influx of refugees means for their own lives.  Numerous people are standing by to meet and begin.  I waited until the last moment to request funding to insure that the pieces were in place before launching.

I need $8,000 for an initial look.  That is a far cry from the billions more we soon will be paying.  We need more eyes and ears paying closer attention.

As normal, more funding means I can do more work.  Healthy funding in Iraq, Afghanistan, and other places, helped me to operate for years and to produce books and many hundreds of dispatches that reached millions of people around the world.

The US economy is tight and so this is ill timing to ask for support.  Yet war does not care.  War is like a hurricane that is always in season.  It comes when it is ready.  Even $10 is great.  If the funding is sufficient, I will endure to look at the crucial countries such as Israel.

This campaign is not a big promotion where donors receive t-shirts and widgets for various levels of support.  We are talking about war, not t-shirts.  This is about the work and digging for answers.  The stakes are tremendous.

Folks who have seen my work over the years know that I will bring home the good, the bad and the ugly, and will publish quality material.

Please support this mission.

Examples of previous work:

http://www.michaelyon-online.com/little-girl.htm
http://www.michaelyon-online.com/grapes.htm
http://www.michaelyon-online.com/gates-of-fire.htm

story:
This is my story and the first step to overcome a crisis




Qué pasa si reúnes más dinero 

Y una vez superada esa meta lo siguiente será reunir fondos para traducirlo al idioma inglés y poderlo presentar con Tony Robbins. 



Qué obtienes a cambio...

En la columna del lado derecho puedes elegir entre una serie de opciones excelentes, aprovecha los costos de lanzamiento por tiempo limitado.

What do I get...

The original idea was to start this first campaign in spanish only and later on I was going to launch a second one to translate the book, but lots of people have convinced me to include them in my campaign, therefore I am adding this video 8 powerful strategies to overcome tragedy for free in case you are facing a problem, it's about the steps I took to survive in prison and transform that experience into a great lesson.
You can check the perks from the right column, as I said, the campaign was meant to be in spanish as it will take some more to translate it, but there are things you can already get, plus your contribution will help us spread the word and create awareness so it can help reduce the unfair cases.

Not everything is money, help me spread the word 


No todo es dinero

Cuando todo esto ocurrió tuve la fortuna de contar con el apoyo de una hermosa e incansable familia, así como de amigos que estuvieron en un momento de vital importancia para mí, pero además conté con el apoyo de gente que ni siquiera conocía ni me conocía, algunos ofreciendo asesoría legal, consejos, oraciones o enviándome alguna carta. Hoy quiero hoy dar algo de regreso a todos ustedes :   http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QZzTNZ9D3-M y podrás ver de manera gratuita un video en el que hablo de las 8 estrategias que usé para poder transformar ese momento de crisis. Si en este momento no estás enfrentando algún problema tal vez haya algo que les pueda servir, también lo pueden compartir con sus seres queridos. Y si quieres además permanecer en contacto y seguir recibiendo información  http://8estrategias.simplelander.com/

Recuerda, puedes ayudar a mucha gentesimplemente compartiendo esta información. HAGAMOS RUIDO AYUDANDO

story:
umebooks.com

is an online development where anyone can write and publish their own books.  We have made it easy for you to copyright and publish your books online.  For those that still want to use publishers because they are the best at what they do in assisting writers and artists, this is the place for them as well.  We want this to be a place for everything in publication.  Where you can search for everything including Novels, Cook Books, Children Books, Comic Books, Magazines, Newspapers, and even those fun things called Coloring-Books.  The greatest thing is that they will be able to be read on all Computers, Tablets, and Smart Phones that have internet access to download them.  Sellers will also be able to offer PDF printing formats and Printed versions in Paperback and Hardback.  With that being said, we welcome you to the future of publishing.

How does it work?

Sellers  choose the book price, choose additional formats such as PDF, Paperback or Hardback, provide details about the book, including the option to allow readers to read the First Page of the book or the First Chapter, and finally they upload their work, which we then convert into our digital platform

Readers search the site for their interests, read the info about the book, and then buy it.  They can then read it online from their account or download it to view anytime offline. If PDF is an option, they can print it.  Paperbacks and Hardbacks are mailed to them.

We have also created an Assistant Program. This is a win, win situation for everyone.  Freelancers and Companies increase profits while being able to assist Sellers with editing, artwork, IBN numbers, or to Copyright their work.  

So, why Indiegogo?

The project has got to the stage of full force, nose to the grindstone, development.  With the launch in July, I need to bring on a few more bodies to fill the seats beside us to get it moving.  Then there are the servers.  The servers have to be able to power this beast into the fast lane.  A slow server is not something that can be tolerated with such a large system. 

The money raised will help with the final stages of getting the site online and ready for users by the mid to end of July.  We will continue with the site and product development even if the funds are not raised, but at snail mail speed instead of internet speed. 

If we raise beyond our goal, we will certainly adjust our rewards for everyone.  It will also allow us to upgrade to product development  and hardware that we planned to do after the site has come fully operational with income from selling books. Which is part of our growth strategy.   We want to accelerate our growth by bootstrapping, which is another term for developing and improving the product with internal cash.  It is the best way for growth with determination that failure is not an option.  Think of it as your first car.  You get the car, next you remove the bald tires - they worked, but were still bald, then you painted it and put in new carpet. That is what we plan to do with our development, continually change it for the better of publishing. 

What do you get out of this?

Besides a bunch of words on paper, I mean text online at indiegogo and the satisfaction of helping create the much needed future platform for publishing.  You will get some Totally Awesome Swag, books, and advertising from us.

The Good Stuff!

* A designed by Morriss, the founder of umebooks.com Signed Post Card

* A most deserving Thank you with your name and contributions listed in the first book to be listed on the site, U, Me, & the Books - the umebooks story.  It will also forever be listed on our site for the world to see . . . f o r e v e r !

* The Coolest Swag to hit the streets. A custom indiegogo umebooks shirt only available to indiegogo backers.  They are made of American Apparel Fine Jersey Tee's.  They are comfortable and fit nicely.

* Different Quantities of books valued up to $10 each

* Ads, Oh Yeah! That's the ticket!  We will only carry 4 ads on our site per day.  They will be the same ads all day long, on every page that has ads placed on them.  We will not be using Site Ads from other sources. These are sold only through our sites advertising.  We will have 2 small mini-ads and 2 large jumbo-ads each day. The way this will work on here is that our backers will get first choice of the days they would like to put their ad on the site, in the order that the backing is done.  So the first person to back for these spots gets first choice. The best spots will be around the holidays, so gobble these up before someone else does.

* International backers, please ad $10 for shipping of the T-Shirts.

Wrap it up already

That is everything in a nutshell.  We have to work on the development, as not to slow down progress, so please be patient with our responses to any questions on here.  I do not have a full time social assistant as of yet, so development is more important to me than twitter or facebook. . . sorry ladies and gents.  That being said, I or a staff member will be checking in every few hours to answer any questions, tweet, facebook, and tumble over our blog on tumblr!

As we do our updates, we will be posting them.  You may view our corny video that we played around with called Read it  by clicking here

Cheers to All!

Morriss - Founder of umebooks.com write it. read it.

 
 
 
 

thanks to the following ( note: the below are not affiliated with or endorse umebooks - We have used their services and want to thank them )

uniquefivex for the video

uberprints for the quality shirts

 

** your billing receipt will say Technomoo,  that is our company name.

story:
Dreamcast Worlds is now finished! Get it at dreamcastworlds.com

Something from the comments:

"I’m really looking forward to this book – it covers an important and under-studied part of videogame history!" - Richard Lemarchand, Design Lead for Uncharted series

"Rupa Zero is a super-smart game thinker and we’re big fans of hers at H&S – great project to support" - Hide and Seek Studios

"Good luck with the project!" - Chris Olson, VP Digital, SEGA of America

A historical book about Dreamcast games, with a unique approach - in this book I tell the story from right inside the games themselves.

Travelling through the maps and screens of three Dreamcast games, follow the network of players, developers and events that contributed to the Dreamcast phenomenon. It's a spatial history of videogames, focusing on a time when 3D, open-world virtual play spaces first became possible.

When you remember video games of the past, what comes to mind? Is it the incredible processing power of the machine on which you played? Is it the hard work of coders and artists whose names you never learned? No, I bet the first thing that you think of when you remember your favourite games is exploring the game yourself. Pushing your character through the terrain, progressing further into new areas, finding hidden secrets... This book tells a history of those game spaces.

Why you'll love this book

I am developing a new approach to video game history that begins within the games themselves, examining the game worlds themselves and reaching outwards into the wider network of production and consumption. It's an inside-out history, and it provides new insights into how games can be interpreted, and what games can mean in their broader context.
 
This project will expand my 30,000-word MA thesis written at the Royal College of Art on the RPG Skies of Arcadia, into a book covering three different Dreamcast games. You can read extracts from it here. 
 
Examiners' praise of the thesis:

"This thesis takes studies of this subject in a new and highly original direction, bringing to it a comparatively broader, holistic perspective... Zoya writes with exceptional clarity about difficult topics and often finds unusually felicitous phrases to articulate her ideas."

"Her discussions of the way in which space is constructed, of game design as a form of spatiality, and of the human interactions within this virtual space are especially illuminating."

"This is undoubtedly an original piece of work, which probes the current thematic limits of Design History."

I want to bring this approach out of academia and into the real world, to test its mettle and stir a bigger conversation with developers, fans and people like you.
 
My thesis came in three parts. First, a thorough documentary history of how Skies of Arcadia and other games for Dreamcast as well as RPGs for other platforms were being developed and discussed. The second chapter examined theoretical perspectives from a range of disciplines on how we can read game space, and how these readings apply to Skies of Arcadia. The third chapter looks at cultural themes in the game from the point of view of cultural exchange in a global information network. In the end, the entire thesis comes full circle, finding that the technological and economic changes happening on a wider scale as described in chapter one were reflected in the spatial designs analysed in chapters two and three.
 
From what I learned when writing my thesis, I came away with the urge to be more bold, and really ground the story in the game worlds. This project will rework those existing three chapters and add two more, expanding the story to incorporate two more Dreamcast games - probably Shenmue and Phantasy Star Online, but I'm open to suggestions. I want to work hard on making this book stimulating but accessible, and by incorporating more games I hope to give an inside look into space design and virtual world architecture at this pivotal moment in video game history.

What I need and what you get

I really want to get this book made, but I need funds to allow me to spend time working on this  instead of taking on more Japanese-English translation work to keep myself afloat. That's part of the reason why I've reached out to the book's audience directly, offering pre-orders and favours in exchange for a sort of writer's advance. If I hit the $5000 target, that will give me just under $3000 after fees, tax and the projected cost of printing the pre-ordered books once I'm finished - enough to let me work part-time on the book for 2-3 months (this figure is a very rough estimate and depends on which reward-level people choose to buy into).
 
In return for your donation, you'll get a digital, paperback or hardback copy (or copies) of the book once it's ready. The higher reward levels come with extra special perks, such as a named acknowledgement in the book, and a blog post about how wonderful you are (and by that I mean you, personally - I'll do my research). If you feel inspired to donate particularly generously, I will write a detailed report on spatial design in a game you have made, applying innovative interpretive and historical techniques to your own work.
 
Should I happen to surpass my target, a few things could happen:
1) The book will be better! More polished content and more exclusive interviews with developers.
2) If I get enough extra funds to cover the cost of writing my next book, you'll all get free pre-order copies of that book too.
3) I'll start 'kicking forward', to use a phrase from another website. I'll put excess funds from this project into indiegogo projects by enterprising young researchers, as well as donating to existing funds to help students in financial need and raise aspirations in underprivileged areas.

Other Ways You Can Help

I want to develop this book in direct conversation with readers - I'll be sharing ideas and snippets with you along the way, and hosting regular debates on Google+ about the issues that come out of my research. No good work can be made without criticism, and you will be the first to hear what I'm working on and voice your opinion about it. I need your feedback as much as I need financial support.

If you're psyched about this project but you're not able to donate funds, then you can still follow my blog (zoyastreet.com) and stay involved in the conversation, albeit at a bit of a delay. I still need your discerning eyes, and I hope you'll be willing to lend them to me.
